1b1(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya aSh+Ta maN+Dal gan nam ma g.yan
1b2(mdo sde): na //
1b3(mdo sde): bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya
1b4(mdo sde): da/ ki n+dur+ra/ kra/ tra/ \u0f89\u0fa4 kra kra rA na tre/ thi r+ya//
1b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang /
2a1(mdo sde): / chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
2a2(mdo sde): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod nu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgron
2a3(mdo sde): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge sbyong gi dge 'dun chen po dang
2a4(mdo sde): thabs cig tu bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mang po la 'di lta ste/ byang chub
2b1(mdo sde): sesems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sgra dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi pham pa dang /
2b2(mdo sde): ngag mchog dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / dri med snying po dang / ye shes rgyal po dang / mtha' yas sde dang /
2b3(mdo sde): ye shes snang ba dang / ye shes sgron ma dang / shes rab snang ba dang / tshangs pas byin dang / byang chub sems
2b4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan dang / de dag dang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
2b5(mdo sde): dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa sha stag dang yang thabs cig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang
3a1(mdo sde): #/ ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi
3a2(mdo sde): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
3a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan shin tu yongs bsgrags dpal zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/
3a4(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
3a5(mdo sde): gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mthong dga' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
3a6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu
3b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba yod de
3b2(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//
3b3(mdo sde): shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par dag pa'i tshogs zhes bya
3b4(mdo sde): ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tig gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
3b5(mdo sde): kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gad+hA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul bral sna tshogs zhes bya ba
3b6(mdo sde): yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas pa snang ba'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
3b7(mdo sde): chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bslu ba med pa zhes bya ba yod
4a1(mdo sde): de/ der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa med par rton pa'i dpal zhes bya ba ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho ning gnas/
4a2(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston to// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams pang+gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi tshogs zhes bya ba
4a3(mdo sde): yod de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad+ma la rnam par gnon pas bzhud pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
4a4(mdo sde): ston to// shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ge'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgra dbyangs snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de
4a5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa ri dbang rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// shA/
4a6(mdo sde): ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brgyad po de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag ni yongs su dag pa ste/ bud med med do// snyigs ma lnga med do// shA ri'i bu
4a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par bzhugs pa gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brgyad po de dag gi mtshan thos
4b1(mdo sde): nas/ len cing 'dzin la klog cing kun chub par byed de/ 'jug par byed cing / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston nu/ shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de sems
4b2(mdo sde): can dmyal bar 'gro ba'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnos sam/ mi dgas kyi yul lam/ lha ma yin rnams kyi nang du 'gro bar 'gyur ba de'i gnas med de/ gau skabs ma yin no// mi lom pa rnams
4b3(mdo sde): su skye ba de'i gnas med do// shA ri'i bu bud med kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan thos nas/ blangs shing bzung la/ bklags
4b4(mdo sde): shing kun chub par byas te/ 'jug par byas shing / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad na/ shA ri'i bu de bud med kyi dngos po lan gnyis len pa'i gnas de med cing go skab ma
4b5(mdo sde): yin te/ de'i gnas med do// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par bzhugs pa gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
4b6(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan thos nas/ blangs shing bzung la/ bklags shing kun chub par byas te/ 'jug par byas shing / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/ de la
4b7(mdo sde): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / rgyal po dang / chom rkun dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / mtshon cha las 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar shes
5a1(mdo sde): par bya'o// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
5a2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan brjod de/ nub mo srod la nyal na de bde bar gnyid kyis ldog par 'gyur// bde bar sad par 'gyur zhing / sdig pa can gyi rmi lam rmi bar mi 'gyur te/ de gnyid kyis log
5a3(mdo sde): pa na yang lha rnams srung bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
5a4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan brjod nas/ mtshan mo tho rangs 'jig rten pa'i bya ba rnams rtsom na/ 'phel ba nyis du 'gyur gyi/ 'grib par mi 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu
5a5(mdo sde): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan thos nas/ len cing 'dzin la
5a6(mdo sde): klog cing kun chub par byed de/ 'jug par byed cing / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/ de 'di nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi bar du nam yang mngon par shes pa dang bral bar mi
5a7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ nam yang gzungs dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang dbang po ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang mtshan dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam yang shes rab shin tu rgyas pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/
5b1(mdo sde): nam yang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de 'di nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi bar du nam yang shes rab phun sum tshogs pa shin/
5b2(mdo sde): tu rgyas pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ badre bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'dzi
5b3(mdo sde): rten mgon po 'di dag gi/ mtshan rnams mi gang 'dzin byed pa// de ni ngan 'gro kun bzlogs nas// ring por mi thogs bde 'gror 'gro// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed// de yi sems ni dang bar
5b4(mdo sde): 'gyur// rtag tu 'jig rten mgon mthong nas// mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// de ni 'du ba'i sgo rnyed cing // de ni rtag tu bkur
5b5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// lha rnams kyis ni rtag tu mchod// myur du byang chub 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// de/
5b6(mdo sde): ni shes rab 'chal pa 'am// blun pa'am 'on par yongs mi 'gyur// kun tu sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pa// de la lha klu gnod sbyin dang // gsang ba lha dang lha min
5b7(mdo sde): rnams// nyin dang mtshan du srung bar byed// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// de ni gzugs mtshan phun sum tshogs// 'byor pa'i rigs su skye 'gyur zhing // da ni sbyin pa'i bdag por
6a1(mdo sde): 'gyur// thub pa rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pas// bskal pa bye ba brgya mang du// de yi kha nas dri 'byung ba// dri bsung zhim po 'byung bar 'gyur// thub pa rnams
6a2(mdo sde): kyi mtshan 'dzin pa// rdzu 'phrul che zhing yid gzhungs la// 'dab ma bye ba stong ldan pa'i// rin chen pad+mar skye bar 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// pha dang ma dang rtsa lag
6a3(mdo sde): dang // spun rnams kyi ni yid 'ong zhing // nam yang phongs pa mthong mi 'gyur// bud med kyis kyang blo ldan pa// de dag rnams kyi mtshan thos na// bud med lus la yid byung nas// mkhas
6a4(mdo sde): shing skye bar skye bar 'gyur// lus can kun la phan pa'i phyir// myur du byang chub 'tshang rgya ste// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi// rten dang skyabs su 'byung bar 'gyur// de la mtshon gyis/
6a5(mdo sde): mi tshugs te// dug gis mi tshugs mes ma yin// g.yon can dag dang chom rkun dang // rgyal po'ang de la gnod mi byed// thub pa rnams kyi mtshan 'dzin pa// de la sdig dang ldan pa'i bdud//
6a6(mdo sde): nag po'i rtsa lag bzhon bcas pas// glags ni rnyed par yong mi 'gyur// zhing rnams bye ba bsam yas su// de ni mtha' las 'gro 'gyur te// phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing der ni// 'jig rten
6a7(mdo sde): mgon po rnams la lta// brtan pa sangs rgyas rnams mthong nas// dad pa brtan po thob par 'gyur// de yi bsam pa mkhyen nas su// mi mchog rnams ni lung ston to// thub pa
6b1(mdo sde): rnams las mngon sum bdag/ byang chub lung bstan thos nas su// rtag tu dga' dang ldan 'gyur zhing // de ni dogs pa med par 'gyur// mkhas pa gang zhig mtshan 'di dag/ thos nas rab tu/
6b2(mdo sde): 'dzin byed pa// de ni yon tan 'di dag dang // rgya cher gzhan yang los kyang thob// thub pa drang srong che gyur pa// 'di dag rnams kyi mtshan thos nas// mi gang mtshan rnams 'dzin byed pa/
6b3(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul che mkhas bsod nams 'dod// de lta bas na bdag nyid che// de dag rnams kyi mtshan thos nas// skyes bu mkhas pas gzung bya zhing // gzhan dag la ni bshad par bya// bcom ldan
6b4(mdo sde): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig
6b5(mdo sde): rten mi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// /
6b6(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shI bi kri DI ti nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//
6b7(mdo sde): bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal
7a1(mdo sde): po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sem dpapa brgyad stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe
7a2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khar chen po na/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig
7a3(mdo sde): 'dug ste/ bu mo yang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyus lus kyi mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bur mngon par grub par gyur cing / sa'i phyogs gang dag tu 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / 'gro ba'i sa
7a4(mdo sde): phyogs de dag kyang / gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur te/ des gos dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ gang dag gyon par gyur pa'i gos de dag thams cad kyang / gser gyi kha dog lta bu nyid
7a5(mdo sde): du sbyang ngo // bu mo de yang skye bo'i tshigs thams cad la dga' zhing yid gcugs pa dang / blta bas mi ngoms shing / bka' blo ba de la nges pa dang / 'jam pa dang / snyan pa dang / dga' bar smra zhing
7a6(mdo sde): bzhin 'dzum pa dang / shin tu 'thun par 'dzin pa dang / khro gnyer med pa dang / mi rtsub pa dang / mi brlang par gyur pas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po de na/ rgyal bu gzhon nu rnams dang /
7a7(mdo sde): blon po'i bu gzhon nu rnams dang / tshong dpon gyi bu gzhon nu rnams dang / khyim bdag gi bu gang ji snyed pa de dag kyang / de la shin tu chags shing yid 'brang bar gyur te/ blta bas chog mi shes so//
7b1(mdo sde): smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal de skyed mos tshal lam/ 'bab chu 'am/ rdzing bu 'am/ khyim mam/ lam po che 'am/ grong bar ram/ gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de dag tu/ skyes pa/
7b2(mdo sde): dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mang po rnams kyang shin tu ltad mor gyur nas/ kun 'dus te de'i phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro'o// de nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal de tshong dpon gyi bu
7b3(mdo sde): 'jigs sbyin zhes bya bas nor gyis glas te/ skyed mos tshal gyis sar byung nas/ rta bzhi dang ldan pa'i shing rta dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / gser gyis legs par brgyan pa
7b4(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng zhing / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phye ma dang / me tog 'phreng ba'i mdzes par byas pa/ me tog tsam pa ka'i 'phreng ba'i skar khung byas pa
7b5(mdo sde): nang du stan bzang po bshams pa la 'dug nas/ 'di ltar rtse zhing dga' ba'i bsam pas shing rta do'i mdun du ni/ sil snyan dang / phag rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs len pa dag gis drangs/ shing rta
7b6(mdo sde): de'i phyi bzhin du nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad pa thogs pa thams cad rjes su 'brang la/ skye bo'i tsho gas chen po ltad mo blta ba'i bsam pa can dag kyang / phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur cing / skyed/
7b7(mdo sde): mos tshal gyi sar dong ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po skyes nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ su zhig rdzu
8a1(mdo sde): 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lam/ kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul lam/ rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i sems can gang theg pa chen po 'di la yongs su smin par
8a2(mdo sde): bya snyam pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin dang lhan cig tu shing rta la zhon te/ skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro bar mthong
8a3(mdo sde): ngo // mthong nas kyang gdul ba'i phyir de'i dbang po dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi bye brag la rnam par bstas na/ de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan zhing / chos kun shes par bya ba'i nus pa dang /
8a4(mdo sde): mthu dang / skal pa yod par rig nas/ de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas te/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'dus
8a5(mdo sde): byas pas/ 'di ltar rang gi lus bstan ma thag tu/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang zil du rlag par byed na/ sems can gzhan dag gi lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de lta bur rang gi lus rnam par sprul nas
8a6(mdo sde): gos gang gi 'od kyis dpag tshad gcig tsam gyi khor yug snang bas/ snang bar byed pa'i gos de lta bu yang lus la gyon par kun tu bstan to// rang gi lus rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan par yang
8a7(mdo sde): bstan to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ lus la gos dang rgyan thams cad kyis legs par brgyan nas/ lam gang nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal 'ong ba'i
8b1(mdo sde): lam de'i mdun logs su bsdad do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas der bsdad ma thag tu/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu de'i shing rta yang mog mog por gyur/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od
8b2(mdo sde): dpal gyi lus thams cad kyang mog mog por gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi drung du sdug che'i yug bzhag na/ lham mer me'i 'dug/ lhan ner mi 'dug/ lcang nger mi
8b3(mdo sde): 'dug go/ de bzhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lus kyi 'od kyis reg pa na/ bu mo de'i lus kyang lham mar mi 'dug/ lhan ner mi 'dug/ lgang nger mi 'dug go/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo
8b4(mdo sde): gser mchog 'od dpal gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lha'i bu gzhon nur ltar 'dug la/ lus la rgyan gyis brgyan cing / gsal ba'i gos legs par gyon la/ gos de las
8b5(mdo sde): kyang 'od 'byung bar mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu de bdag gi lus la brnyas pa'i 'du shes dang / dman pa'i 'du shes skyes shing / gos de la yang mngon par 'dod pa dang / bzung ba'i 'du
8b6(mdo sde): shes skyes nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ tshong dpon gyi bu 'dris chog gis/ bdag shing rta 'di las babs la/ 'di dang lhan cig tu dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / dga' dgur
8b7(mdo sde): spyad la/ gos 'di yang bslang bar bya'o snyam mo// bu mo des de lta bu'i sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ rgyal po chen po
9a1(mdo sde): rnam thos kyi bus bdag nyid mi'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod skyes bu dam pa 'di la kun tu chags pa'i
9a2(mdo sde): sems ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni 'dod pa don du gnyer ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// bu mos smras pa/ 'di su zhig yin na/ 'di'i ming ci/ rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ 'di ni//
9a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya'o// bu mos smras pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ci zhig yin/ de ci lha 'am/ 'on te klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/
9a4(mdo sde): dri za 'am/ lha ma yin nam nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci 'amalto 'phye chen po 'am/ brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba 'amargyal po chen po 'am byang chub
9a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ci zhig yin/ rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni/ lha yang ma yin/ klu yang mi yin gnod sbyin yang ma yin/ dri za ya
9a6(mdo sde): ma yin lha ma yin yang ma yin/ nam mkha' lding yang ma yin/ mi 'am ci yang ma yin/ lto 'phye chen po yang ma yin/ brgya byin yang ma yin/ tshangs pa yang ma yin/ 'jig rten/
9a7(mdo sde): skyong ba yang ma yin/ rgyal po chen po yang ma yin te/ bu mo de ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa kun yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o//
9b1(mdo sde): 'di ni bslangs pa thams cad sbyin par byed de/ yongs su mi gtong ba ci yang med pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// de nas bu mo de 'di snyam du sems te/ de skad
9b2(mdo sde): grag pa las na 'dis bdag la gos 'di sbyin par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal shing rta de las babs nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
9b3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gong khyod kyi sku la gsol ba'i na bza' 'di bdag la stsal du gsol/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so// gal te khyod ni byang chub la yang
9b4(mdo sde): zhugs gyur na/ 'jam dbyangs na bza' 'di ni bdag la stsal du gsol// ser sna can gyi byang chub sems dpa' mi mdzes te// dper na chab dang bral ba'i bskams pa'i klung dang
9b5(mdo sde): mtshungs// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gal te bu mo khyod ni byang chub zhugs gyur na// kho bos de ring gos 'di khyod la sbyin par bya// gang dag g.yo ba med par byang chub sems la gnas
9b6(mdo sde): de dag 'di ni lhar bcus 'jig rten mchod 'os yin// bu mos smras pa/ byang chub ces bgyi ba yi tshig gi don gang zhig lagaso// de ni gang las thob cing su zhig stsol bar bgyid// tshogs
9b7(mdo sde): rnams gang dag la ni nges par bsten bgyis na// mkhas pa ma lags ma rtogs rnams kyis rtogs par 'gyur// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo brjod pa med pa dang / yi ge med
10a1(mdo sde): pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag las rnam par grol ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma dag dang bral ba dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / zhi ba dang /
10a2(mdo sde): rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba ni byang chub ces bya'o// de skad ces smras nas/ yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// sring mo khyod byang chub tu sems
10a3(mdo sde): skyed cig dang / ngas khyod la gos 'di sbyin no// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub ces bgyi ba de gang lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo khyod nyid byang chub yin no// bu mos
10a4(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis gsungs pa'i don de bdag gis ma 'tshal na/ ji ltar bdag byang chub lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
10a5(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs pa de/ 'di skad du 'di ltar lus mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis lus mnyam pa
10a6(mdo sde): nyid do zhes chos ston te/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyi lus 'di la phung po dang / khams dang /
10a7(mdo sde): skye mched mngon par grub pa yod dam/ de nas bu mo des bstan pa 'di thos nas/ de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu 'thun pas/ chos la snang ba skyes par gyur te/ des snang ba thob/
10b1(mdo sde): nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal de ni de lta lags te/ bdag gi lus 'di la phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag mngon par grub
10b2(mdo sde): pa ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs la sems pa 'am/ rnam par shes pa yod dmapa bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpa' de nam
10b3(mdo sde): mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub kyang mi sems shing / rnam par shes pa med de/ sring mo de'i phyir gzugs mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do//
10b4(mdo sde): byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis gzugs mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
10b5(mdo sde): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sems pa 'am/ rnam par shes pa yod dam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub
10b6(mdo sde): kyang mi sems shing / rnam par shes pa med de/ sring mo de'i phyir rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid de
10b7(mdo sde): sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang gzugs nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ gnyis ka med par ram/ gzugs 'di sngon po'am/
11a1(mdo sde): ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ le brgan nAm/ shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog gam/ yul na gnas pa'am/ phyogs na gnas pa zhes bstan
11a2(mdo sde): par nus sam/ bu mos smras pa 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub kyang nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ gnyis ka med par ram/ byang chub de
11a3(mdo sde): sngon po 'am/ ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ le brgan nam/ shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog gam/ yul na gnas pa'am/ phyogs na gnas pa zhes bstan par mi nus te/
11a4(mdo sde): sring mo de'i phyir gzugs mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis gzugs mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras
11a5(mdo sde): so// sring mo de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ gnyis ka med par ram/ rnam par shes pa 'di sngon po
11a6(mdo sde): 'am/ ser po 'amadamar po 'amadakar po 'am le brgan nam/ shel dang dngul gyi kha dog gam/ yul na gnas pa 'am/ phyogs na gnas pa zhes bstan par nus sam
11a7(mdo sde): bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub kyang nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ gnyis ka med par ram/ byang chub de sngon po'am//
11b1(mdo sde): ser po'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ le brgan nam/ shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog gam/ yul na gnas pa 'am/ phyogs na gnas pa zhes bstan par mi nus te/ sring mo de'i
11b2(mdo sde): phyir rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub
11b3(mdo sde): po zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yod pa ma yin pa/ phyin ci log las skyes shing / yod pa ma yin pa/ phyin ci log gis tha snyad btags pa'o// sring mo byang
11b4(mdo sde): chub kyang sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yod pa ma yin pa/ phyin ci log gis tha snyad btags pa ste/ sring mo de'i phyir sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis sgyu ma mnyam
11b5(mdo sde): pa nyid do// sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras re/
11b6(mdo sde): sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rmi lam lta bu ste// shin tu mngon par ma grub pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang rmi lam gyi rang bzhin yin pas/ shin tu mngon par grub pa ste/ sring mo de'i phyir rmi lan/
11b7(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis rmi lam mnyam pa nyid do// rmi lam mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis rmi lam
12a1(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/ 'khrul pa'i las kyis bskyed/
12a2(mdo sde): pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang smig rgyu'i rang bzhin te/ las kyi rnam par smin pa med pa'o// sring mo de'i phyir smig rgyu mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis smig
12a3(mdo sde): rgyu mnyam pa nyid do// smig rgyu mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis smig rgyu mnyam pa nyid do// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes
12a4(mdo sde): smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ 'pho ba med pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang gzugs brnyan gyi rang bzhin te/ 'phro ba med pa'o// sring mo de'i phyir gzugs
12a5(mdo sde): brnyan mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid do// gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid kyis sa byang chub mnyam pa nyid do//
12a6(mdo sde): byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni ming tsam ste/ ming /
12a7(mdo sde): de yang g.yo ba med pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang ming tsam ste/ ming de yang g.yo ba med pa'o// g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis g.yo//
12b1(mdo sde): ba med pa mnyam pa nyid do// g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis g.yo ba med pa mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad
12b2(mdo sde): du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po rnams la byed pa po med de/ ma byas pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la ngo bo nyid med de/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i don
12b3(mdo sde): ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la byung ba med de/ ma byung ba'i don no byang chub bo// phung po rnams la rtag pa nyid med de/ mi rtag pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la bde ba nyid
12b4(mdo sde): med de/ sdug bsngal ba'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la sdug pa med de/ mi sdug pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la bdag med de/ bdug med pa'i don ni byang chub bo//
12b5(mdo sde): sring mo gzhan yang phung po rnams la mngon par grub pa med de/ mngon par ma grub pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams ni dben pa ste/ dben pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la
12b6(mdo sde): gzung ba med do// gzung ba med pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la gzhi med de/ gzhi med pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med de/ 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med
12b7(mdo sde): pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams ni da ltar byung ba la mi gnas pa ste/ da ltar byung ba la mi gnas pa'i don ni byang chub bo// sring mo gzhan yang phung po rnams ni 'phags pa
13a1(mdo sde): rnams kyi tha snyad yin pas/ byang chub kyang 'phags pa rnams kyi tha snyad do// phung po rnams ni tha snyad med pa'i rang bzhin can te/ byang chub kyang tha snyad med
13a2(mdo sde): pa'o// phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin te/ de ni byang chub ces bya'o// sring mo de ltar na phung po
13a3(mdo sde): lnga'i rang bzhin ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin no// byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin te/ sring mo phung po lnga'i rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi rang bzhin grang yin//
13a4(mdo sde): pa de ni/ sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin te/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po rtogs pa gang yin pa de/
13a5(mdo sde): nyid byang chub yin te/ phung po ma gtogs par yang rtogs pa yang med la/ byang chub la gtogs par yang rtogs pa med pas/ de ltar rtogs pa gang yin pa de byang chub ces bya ste/
13a6(mdo sde): sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo rnam grang 'dis na 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ ji ltar sems can thams cad byang chub tu gtogs pa ltar/
13a7(mdo sde): de gtogs pa med par bstan pa ni byang chub ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang khyod kyis lus 'di la/ sa'i kham dang
13b1(mdo sde): chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / khams bzhi po de dag mngon par grub pa de la/ sring mo sa'i khams ni bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin
13b2(mdo sde): skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// byang chub kyang bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// de bzhin du chu'i khams
13b3(mdo sde): dang me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// byang chub kyang bdag ma yin/ sems
13b4(mdo sde): can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// shin tu nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir sa'i khams dang byang chub mnyam mo// shin tu med pa'i phyir chu'i
13b5(mdo sde): khams dang byang chub mnyam mo// shin tu mi g.yo ba'i phyir me'i khams dang byang chub mnyam mo// shin tu bstan du med pa'i phyir rlung gi khams dang byang chub mnyam mo// sring mo sa'i
13b6(mdo sde): kham gang yin pa'i khams de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do// sring mo chu'i khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni/ de bzhin gshegs
13b7(mdo sde): pas mkhyen te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do// sring mo me'i khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su
14a1(mdo sde): chud do// sring mo rlung gi khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do// sring mo sa'i
14a2(mdo sde): khams rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// sring mo de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams rtogs pa ni byang chub ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid
14a3(mdo sde): byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo sa'i khams kyis chu'i khams yang dag par mi shes so// chu'i khams kyis me'i khams yang dag par mi shes so// me'i khams kyis rlung gi kham
14a4(mdo sde): yang dag par mi shes so// sring mo de ltar na khams kyi ming yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub ces bya ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras
14a5(mdo sde): so// sring mo gzhan yang gang khyod kyi lus 'di la mig mngon par grub pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mngon par grub pa de la/ sring mo mig ni stong pa ste//
14a6(mdo sde): mig stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// rna ba ni stong pa ste/ rna ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// sgra ni stong pa ste/ sna stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// lce ni stong pa ste/
14a7(mdo sde): lce stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// lus ni stong pa ste/ lus stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// yid ni stong pa ste/ yid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// sring mo
14b1(mdo sde): de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang mig stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs su 'dogs par mi byed de/ gzugs stong pa'i gzugs
14b2(mdo sde): kyi ngo bo nyid ni byang chub bo// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni chos su 'dogs par mi byed de/ chos stong pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid ni byang chub ste/
14b3(mdo sde): sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo mig ni gzugs mi len te/ byang chub kyang gzugs mi len to// rna ba ni sgra mi len te/ byang chub kyang sgra
14b4(mdo sde): mi len to// sna ni dri mi len te/ byang chub kyang dri mi len to// lce ni ro mi len te/ byang chub kyang ro mi len to// lus ni reg bya mi len te/ byang chub kyang reg bya mi len to// yid ni chos
14b5(mdo sde): mi len te/ byang chub kyang chos mi len to// sring mo de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gzugs dang bral ba ni byang chub po// yid chos dang bral ba'i bar du yang byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro// srid
14b6(mdo sde): mo de ltar na mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs kyi khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams su bral
14b7(mdo sde): ba ni byang chub bo// rna ba'i rnam par shes pas khams gang yin pa de ni/ sgra'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / sgra'i khams su bral
15a1(mdo sde): ba ni byang chub bo// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ dri'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /
15a2(mdo sde): dri'i khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ ro'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / ro'i khams//
15a3(mdo sde): su bral ba ni byang chub po// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ reg bya'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / reg pa'i//
15a4(mdo sde): khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi khams dang mtshams sbyor ba med de/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos
15a5(mdo sde): kyi khams su bral ba ni byang chub ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo de ltar na byang chub dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni//
15a6(mdo sde): gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do// byang chub dang / gzugs kyi khams de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do// byang chub dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyis/
15a7(mdo sde): su med de gnyis su dbyer med do// byang chub dang / yid kyi khams kyi bar du de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do// byang chub dang chos kyi khams de ni/ gnyis su med de gnyis
15b1(mdo sde): su dbyer med do// byang chub dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so//
15b2(mdo sde): sring mo gzhan yang mig mi rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// mig gi rang bzhin stong pa ste/ rang bzhin
15b3(mdo sde): stong pa de ni byang chub bo// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rang bzhin ni stong pa ste/ rang bzhin stong pa de ni byang chub bo// sring mo mig gi rang bzhin ni ma/
15b4(mdo sde): chags mi sdang ma rmongs pa ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang bral ba ni byang chub bo// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rang bzhin ni ma chag
15b5(mdo sde): mi sdang ma rmongs pa ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang bral ba ni byang chub bo// sring mo mig ni bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ste/
15b6(mdo sde): byang chub kyang bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus drang yid kyang bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/
15b7(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin pa med pa ste/ byang chub kyang bdag po med pa/ bdag gi med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o// sring mo mig ni skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang
16a1(mdo sde): ma yin/ bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ bud med/
16a2(mdo sde): kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no// sring mo de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/
16a3(mdo sde): bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa'i chos drang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang
16a4(mdo sde): ma yin no// sring mo de bzhin du mig ni skyes pa yang ma yin no// bud med kyang mi yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin no// sring mo yid kyi//
16a5(mdo sde): bar du yang skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud med kyang ma yin no// sring mo de ltar mig gi de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin
16a6(mdo sde): gshegs pas thugs su chud de/ de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// yid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi bar du yang de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud de/ de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni
16a7(mdo sde): byang chub bo// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang khyod kyi lus 'di ni bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin//
16b1(mdo sde): skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin/ shed las skyes pa ma yin/ shed bu ma yin/ byed pa po ma yin/ tshor ba po ma yin/ shes pa po ma yin/ mthong ba po ma yin/ nyan pa
16b2(mdo sde): po ma yin/ snom pa po ma yin/ za ba po ma yin/ reg pa po ma yin/ rnam par shes pa po ma yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma
16b3(mdo sde): yin/ gso pa ma yin/ gang zag ma yin/ bdag gi ma yin/ yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin/ byas pa ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin/ gzugs ma yin/ sgra ma yin/ dri ma yin/
16b4(mdo sde): ro ma yin/ reg bya rnam par rig pa ma yin te/ sring mo de lta bas na chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ni byang chub ces bya'o// sring mo gang yang khyod kyi lus ni g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med
16b5(mdo sde): pa/ rtag pa med pa ste/ rtsa dang / shing dang / shing ljon pa dang / rtsig pa'i tshogs rnams dang khyad par med cing / tha dad du dbyer med do// sring mo gang yang nang gi sa'i khams da
16b6(mdo sde): phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gnyis su med cing / gnyis su dbyer med cing / gnyis su dbyer med de/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig par/ de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab
16b7(mdo sde): dang / ye shes kyis mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang sems dang / yid dang /
17a1(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa gang gis sems pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i sems dang / yid dang rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa de ni/ sbal gnas
17a2(mdo sde): pa ma yin/ spu la gnas pa ma yin/ sha mdog la gnas pa ma yin/ pags pa la gnas pa ma yin/ sha la gnas pa ma yin/ khrag la gnas pa ma yin/ rus pa la gnas pa ma
17a3(mdo sde): yin/ chu ba la gnas pa ma yin/ rkang la gnas pa ma yin/ nang la gnas pa ma yin/ phyi rol la gnas pa ma yin/ gnyis ka med pa la gnas pa ma yin/ mig la gnas pa ma yin//
17a4(mdo sde): rna ba la gnas pa ma yin/ sna la gnas pa ma yin/ lce la gnas pa ma yin/ lus la gnas pa ma yin/ yid la gnas pa ma yin te/ gnas pa ma yin/ mi gnas pa ma yin//
17a5(mdo sde): rgyun chad pa ma yin/ yul na gnas pa ma yin/ phyogs na gnas pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ gzung ba med pa/ 'dre ba med pa/
17a6(mdo sde): gzhi med pa/ dag pa/ gtsang ba/ 'od gsal ba ste/ sems dang yid kyi rnam par rig pa de ni// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ rnam par byang ba med pa ste/ de ni rang bzhin gyis
17a7(mdo sde): rnam par dag cing / 'od gsal la/ lus med pa'i phyir/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing / rnam par dag pa med do// sring mo de ltar na phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi rang bzhin /
17b1(mdo sde): ni byang chub bo// byang chub kyi rang bzhin yang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams so// sring mo khyod kyi lus 'di la phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched gang dag mngon
17b2(mdo sde): par grub pa de dag ni byang chub ste/ byang chub gzhan ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams las gzhan ma yin te/ de bdag nyid
17b3(mdo sde): byang chub yin pas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa ni/ byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// 'jam
17b4(mdo sde): dpal gnon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha'i bu lnga 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// gang
17b5(mdo sde): dag smad 'tshong mo'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams las srog chags nyis brgyas kyang bla na med pa yang dag
17b6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// lha dang mi drug cu ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// smad 'tsheng ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od
17b7(mdo sde): dpal yang tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te// rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis
18a1(mdo sde): la gtugs te/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su song nas/ tshangs par spyad pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dag par blangs te/
18a2(mdo sde): lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'jim dpal bdag kyang / khyod kyi rjes su bstan pa dang /
18a3(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / snying rje sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi gcod pa dang / chos kyi gdung mi gcod pa dang / dge 'dun gyi gdung mi gcod pa'i srad du/ khyod kyis
18a4(mdo sde): bstan pa la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// de bzhin du chos rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sems can thams cad la chos bstan
18a5(mdo sde): par yang bgyi'o// nyes par bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du/ nongs pa la nongs par bshags par bgyi'o// gang ni chos thams cad zhi zhing nye bar zhi bar ma
18a6(mdo sde): rtogs nas/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i sngon du 'gro ba dang / phyin ci log gi dbang du mchis pa dang / rang gi lus la mngon par zhen pas/ 'dod chags kyi sbyor ba dang
18a7(mdo sde): ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni/ chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ma rtogs so// 'jam dpal de lta lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang gang dag 'dod chags kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i sems
18b1(mdo sde): can de dag kyang chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ci 'dra ba de nyid dang ldan no// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ldan pa'i chos 'di la slob cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
18b2(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams ni/ ji ltar mchis pa ma lags pa lu/ kun brtags pa las 'byung bar de ltar kun rtag
18b3(mdo sde): pa yongs su rtogs na/ 'gag par 'gyur ba sa gsog dang 'dra ba'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar khyod kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ nyon mongs pa rnams ni/
18b4(mdo sde): rang bzhin ma mchis shing byung ba ma mchis pas sprin gyi tshogs dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni skad cig la 'jig cing 'jug ste/ chu'i chu bur dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni shi
18b5(mdo sde): tu mngon par grub pa ma mchis pa ste rlung dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das te/ nam mkha' ri mo dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni ring du/
18b6(mdo sde): mi gnas pas chu'i ri mo dang 'dra'o// nyod mongs pa rnams ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa'i 'jug pa las 'byung ba ste gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa
18b7(mdo sde): rnams ni ma mchis pa la phyin ci log tu mthong ba las 'byung ba ste/ sprin mar dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni kun brtags pa las byung ba ste/ yang dag par ma lags pa'o//
19a1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams ni ngar 'dzin pas lhag par chags pa dang 'brel ba'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni bdag gir 'dzin pas/ dngos por yongs su
19a2(mdo sde): 'dzin pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni log pas bskyed pas glo bur du byung ba'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni rnam par rtog pa las byung bas/ mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba
19a3(mdo sde): dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni khams sna tshogs la mi dpyod pa'i tshul gyis bskyed pa ste so sor mi rtog pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni sems dang rjes su 'thun par/
19a4(mdo sde): bskyed pa ste/ nges par mi sems pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni bdag dang gzhan la mngon par zhen pa las byung ba ste/ yid ches par mi bgyi ba'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni phung po
19a5(mdo sde): dge len pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni khams rnams la ril por 'dzin pa'o// nyon mongs rnams ni skye mched rnams sogs pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni ming dang gzugs pa/
19a6(mdo sde): rnam par 'byed pa'o// rkyen mongs pa rnams ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yidul bgyid pa dag mi rtogs pa'o// 'dzum dpal de yu lags myod kyi/ ldan kyang sbyin mongs pa rnams ni
19a7(mdo sde): byang chub kyi phu bu'i gni lags so// de ci'i slad du ne na/ byang chub ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni byang chub kyis thon te/ nyon mongs pa rtogs pa/
19b1(mdo sde): nyid bangargyab lags so// nyon mongs pa rnams ni byang chub de rje'i gzhi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings dbyer ma mchis pa'i chub kyis/ blang chub ni nyon mongs pa
19b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis mi byed pa'i slad du'o// 'jam dpa' nyon mongs pa rnams mthong ba ni byang chub ste/ byang chub ni yul thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'o// 'jam dang la dzi d+ha byang chub rnam
19b3(mdo sde): pur gnas pa ma mchis pa de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams kyang rnam par gnas pa ma mchis pa ste/ skyes nas 'jig cing 'dzubs mi gnas pa'o// 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams
19b4(mdo sde): ni sems kyi rang bzhin lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal sems 'di ni/ chags pa 'am/ sdang ba'am/ rmongs pa zhes/ sems kyi rang bzhin bstan par
19b5(mdo sde): mi nus te/ 'jam dpal ji ltar sems bstan par mi nus pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang / yul na gnas pa 'am/ phyogs na gnas pa zhes/ nyon mongs pa'i rang
19b6(mdo sde): bzhin bstan par mi nus pa'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ ji lta ji ltar nyon mongs pa de dag rab tu rtogs pa de lta de ltar/
19b7(mdo sde): 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba la skyo bar mi 'gyur ro// zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams la ma lags gti mug la spyod pa rnams la ma
20a1(mdo sde): lags te/ cha mnyam pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams yongasu su smin par bgyi ba la skyo bar mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal du ltar bdug gi dod chags
20a2(mdo sde): ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'dod chags la spyod pa thams cad kyi 'dod chagasal blta bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal da lta ro bdag gi ni sdang ji lta ba bzhin du/ zhe sangal spyod pa thams ca
20a3(mdo sde): zhe sdang la blta bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal dra ltar bdag gti mug ji lta ba de bzhin du/ gti mug la spyod pa thams cad kyi gti mug la blta bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal ltar
20a4(mdo sde): bdag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa thams cad la spyod pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa la blta bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/
20a5(mdo sde): dper na/ me ni rtsa dang / shing thams cad kyis 'jigs pa ma mchis so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi me yang nyon mongs pa'i rtswa dang / shing tham/
20a6(mdo sde): cad kyis 'jigs pa ma mchis so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ mun pa mun nag thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin
20a7(mdo sde): du 'phags pa'i shes rab kyang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung dmar ni shing ljon pa dang / ri thams cad la mi/
20b1(mdo sde): rnags so// 'jam dpa la dri bzhi dzums pa shes rab la spyad da drang chub sems dngu' 'du/ nas sa bu'i sus thams da du na nag sa 'ang nga /
20b2(mdo sde): lta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i khams ni sreg pa'i bskal pa thams cad kyis tshig par mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyon pa'i byang chub sems
20b3(mdo sde): dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa'i sreg pa'i bskal pa thams cad kyis tshig par mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni rdul dang / nabyin dang / sprin thams
20b4(mdo sde): dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam
20b5(mdo sde): dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni sa dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs
20b6(mdo sde): pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na khab long ni lcags dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang
20b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper nari khor yug ni rlung thams cad kyis bskyod par mi nus so// 'jam
21a1(mdo sde): du bya su na sa / smras smran/
21a2(mdo sde): na/ su dzin sa nga pan na/ grus pa sa / rgyu
21a3(mdo sde): de byin du 'jugs pa'i shes bral skye 'i mang chu sems dpa' 'du 'phags pa gas rag du 'du dis pa sa spyod
21a4(mdo sde): nyon me sa pa ni ma lags so// 'jam pal 'di ste sde dper na/ byung gi ga mi sman kyi gling na rgyu 'du 'brel ba'i bud rjed rnams / gleng gis na kyi/
21a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin du dbang po yongs su ma smin du'i sems can rnams la/ byang chub sems pa'i spyod pa deng 'phags pa'i shes rab dang ye shes 'dud par mi bgyid do// 'a
21a6(mdo sde): dngul bdag ni da ltar nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa'am/ skrag pa ci yang ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal bdag gis chos thams cad kyi
21a7(mdo sde): bzhin dben par rtogs pa'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos pa ste/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/
21b1(mdo sde): gang dgras 'jigs pa de ni dpa' bo zhes mi bgyi'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du gung nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa de yang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bgyi'o//
21b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ gang dgus bcom pa de ni dpa' bo zhes mi bgyi'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du gang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bcom pa de yang byang chub sems
21b3(mdo sde): dpa' zhes mi bgyi'o// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che chu ldang zhes bgyi ba chub kyi nang du stsal na gsher bar yang mi 'gyur zhing / chab kyi dri mas kyang ma gos la/
21b4(mdo sde): chab kyi rnyog ma thams cad kyang rab tu dang bar bgyid do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i nang na gnas kyang /
21b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pas gsher bar yang mi 'gyur zhing / nyon mongs pa'i dri mas kyang mi gos la/ nyon mongs pa'i rnyog ma thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar bgyid do// de nas
21b6(mdo sde): smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis bstan pa 'di bshad nas/ yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub
21b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa lags 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub sems dpa' gang gis nyon mongs pa skye ba 'am/ 'gag par mthong na
22a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad med pa zhes mi bu'o// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ 'bru mar gyi sgron ma la mun pa mun nag sdung na
22a2(mdo sde): de 'bru mar gyi sgron ma zhes mi bya'o// sring mo de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang gis nyon mongs pa skye ba'am/ 'gag par mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyon
22a3(mdo sde): rmongs pa med pa zhes mi bya'o// sring mo nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni/ su gang kun nas nyon mongs pa yang mi mthong / rnam par byang ba yang mi mthong ste/ mthong ba dang /
22a4(mdo sde): mi mthong ba dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam pa rig pa dang bral ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o// sring mo gang dang gang du sems dang / yid dang / rnam par rig pa 'jug na/
22a5(mdo sde): tha na mya ngan las 'das par sems par yang rung ste/ de thams cad ni nyon mongs pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa med pa la ni sems sam/ sems la 'jug pa med pa'i
22a6(mdo sde): phyir te/ glang gis dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba'i dmigs pa la sems 'jug pa de dag thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa'o// gang mngon par 'du byed pa de ni 'khor ba'o// ga
22a7(mdo sde): 'khor ba de ni 'du byed do// 'du byed thams cad ni 'khor ba ste/ sring mo de dag ni nyon mongs pa yin no// sring mo nyin mongs pa zhes bya ba de ni sbyor ba ste ka mig dang gzugs su sbyo
22b1(mdo sde): bani nyon mongs pa'o// de bzhin dun pa dang / sgra dang / dang / dri dang / dang / rodang / lus dang/ bya dang / yid du rgyas su ston pa smos 'o/ sgyu
22b2(mdo sde): la sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o// ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba ni nyan mongs pa'o// shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol bu'i ma shes mthong ba la sbyor bu na
22b3(mdo sde): pa'o// rab tu dben pa la sbyor bar sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'o// sring mo nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba ni/ rgyu ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig tha dgas so// de ni spros pa med pa/
22b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// de ni rtsol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// de ni 'byung ba med pa zhes bya ba'i chog bla dgas te/ sring mo grangs dang / grangs med pa dang bral ba ni/
22b5(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa med pa nyid do// sring mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang bdag la yang nyon mongs pa med la/ gzhan dag nyon mongs pa las kyang rab tu thar par bya ba la yang shi na//
22b6(mdo sde): tu brtson pa de ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ gzhan dag nyon mongs pa las rab tu thar bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus
22b7(mdo sde): yang dag phul lo// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul gang lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ stong pa nyid la so sor rtogs
23a1(mdo sde): pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / kha la ston pa'i sems can rnams la nyid rje ba dang / mya tshanam med pa lngas sor rtogs pa'i rdzas su 'jug cing mtsha/ ma
23a2(mdo sde): spyon pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba drang / smon pa med pa la so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / smon pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la skyong rdza bya dngag mngon par 'du
23a3(mdo sde): pa la so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / skye ba med cing 'chi 'pho med pa la so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su
23a4(mdo sde): 'jug cing / rga ba dang / shi bar 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / skye ba med pa la so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / skye ba dang / 'jig par 'du shes
23a5(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / nyan thos su nges pa la so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / nyan thos kyi 'bras bu thob pa las ldog pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su nges pa la so//
23a6(mdo sde): sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob pa las ldog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la 'jug pa so sor rtogs pa'i rjes su 'jug
23a7(mdo sde): cing / sems can thams cad la yang snying rje ba ste/ sring mo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul lo// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa ni
23b1(mdo sde): sgra'i/ rin po che chen po dag thogs te ldog par ni dka'a'o// sring mo de bzhin du stong pa nyid la so sor rtogs par ni mra'i/ thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas ldog par ni
23b2(mdo sde): 'o// mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / nyan thos kyi skyon med pa dang ni rang sangs rgyas
23b3(mdo sde): kyi skyon med pa la yang so sor rtogs par ni sla'ithabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas ldog par ni dka' 'o// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ g.yul ngo chen por 'jug pa ni sla'o//
23b4(mdo sde): ma smos pa mnyam par rgyal bar ni dka' 'o// sring mo de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum du 'jug par ni sla'i thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas ldog par ni dka' 'o// bu
23b5(mdo sde): mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal thabs zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu lags 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo thabs zhes bya ba ni gang phyogs gnyid mi spong ba ste/ 'di ltar 'khor
23b6(mdo sde): ba'i phyogs dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs so// sring mo thabs zhes bya ba gang sgo gnyis ston par byed pa ste/ 'khor ba'i sgo dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo dang / stong pa
23b7(mdo sde): nyid kyi sgo dang / lta ba las rab tu thar pa'i sgo dang / mtshan ma med pa'i sgo dang / mtshan ma las rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / smon pa med pa'i sgo dang / bsams bzhin du skye ba'i/
24a1(mdo sde): sgo dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i sgo dang / dge ba mngon du bya ba'i sgo dang / skye ba med pa'i sgo dang / skye ba kun tu ston pa'i sgo dang / 'byung ba med pa'i/
24a2(mdo sde): sgo dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi sgo dang / skye ba med cing / 'gag pa med pa'i sgo dang / skye ba dang / 'byung ba'i sgo dang / bden pa'i sgo dang / sems can mong/
24a3(mdo sde): su smin par bya ba'i sgo dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo dang / chos thams cad so sor bsrung ba'i sgo dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgo dang /
24a4(mdo sde): rang byang chub kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mi brjed pa'i sgo ste/ sring mo byang chub sems dpa' gang sgro gnyis nye bar ston kyang / sgo thams cad la yang chags pa med pa de ni thab/
24a5(mdo sde): mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin du 'dod chags kyi sgo dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgo dang / zhe sdang gi sgo dang / zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sgo dang / gti mug gi sgo dang / gti mug
24a6(mdo sde): dang bral ba'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i sgo dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgo dang / 'gro ba med pa'i sgo ste/ sring mo 'di ni byang chub sems pa'i/
24a7(mdo sde): thabs la mkhas pa'o// byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi spyod pa'i sgo dang / slob pa'i dang / mi slob pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod/
24b1(mdo sde): man gang man sa/ sa ga na / pas sa sa
24b2(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe na/ bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ngos kyi sman ldong zhig na/ zhabs 'bring byed pa'i dge slong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang gcig tu ring du 'chag pas/
24b3(mdo sde): 'chag cing bzhugs so// der bzhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dge phul
24b4(mdo sde): dang / thabs la mkhas pa ji skad bstun pa de ni de bzhin te/ legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin pa dang / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra des/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
24b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dbyangs kyis go bar gyur cing / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra do nyid kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khrims 'di rnam pa
24b6(mdo sde): drug tu g.yos par gyur nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang /
24b7(mdo sde): mi ma yin pa rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba mang po dag legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra des bskul nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/
25a1(mdo sde): phrin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyog sugacig tu 'khod nasa.A lA dang
25a2(mdo sde): dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / brgya byin dang / nangs
25a3(mdo sde): pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes bgyi ba'i sgra gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen
25a4(mdo sde): po'i 'jig cen khams dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad pa de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis su la stsal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de ni 'jam dpal
25a5(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la'o// lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de da lta gA na mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
25a6(mdo sde): lha'i bu dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i shar phyogs kyi sgo na/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bya ba dang ldan
25a7(mdo sde): cig tu chos dang ldan pa'i gtam zer zhing 'dug gis/ lha'i bu dag gang dag chos nyan par 'dod pa dag kyang der deng zhig/ de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
25b1(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag bla ma cad/
25b2(mdo sde): lhan cig tu 'dus nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / lus rags par sprul nas/ me tog gi chur rab tu phab ste/ me tog gi char
25b3(mdo sde): des rgyal po'i khab kyi kho ra khor yug tu/ me tog gis chal par bkram par gyur to// de nas wa rnams kyis kyang mi rnams mthong zhing / mi rnams kyis kyang zhwa rnams
25b4(mdo sde): mthong ste/ phan tshun smra bar mi byed de// de ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas/ srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dgra me tog de dag gis kyang bskul/ lha'i lus
25b5(mdo sde): rags pa de dag gis kyang bskul nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gral ba der dong ngo // rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang bud med kyi tshogs kyis bskor te/ dpung gi tshogs yan
25b6(mdo sde): lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der song nas/ 'khor de dang / rgyal po ma skyes dgra
25b7(mdo sde): dang / blon po dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag gi bu rnams kyis/ smad 'tshong mo'i bu ma gser mchog 'od dpal de/ 'dod chags kyis nyon mongs
26a1(mdo sde): par kun nas ldang ba dang bral te/ dbang po dang spyod la mA rab tu / dbang po mig yeng la/ don shes pa dang / dpal kyi stsa gas pa nan/
26a2(mdo sde): pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de la phyin chad su yang 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa mi skye bar gyur to// de nas 'dzum dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po
26a3(mdo sde): 'dus par rig nas/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo ga ser mchog 'od dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis khyod mthong yang / phyir zhing chags pa
26a4(mdo sde): med na/ khyod kyis nyon mongs pa de dag gang du bzhag/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams ni/ ye shes dang rnam par grol ba la gnas/
26a5(mdo sde): pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa ste/ de dag kyang ma bskyed pa dang / ma bkag pa dang / ma bsgyur bar de ltar bdag gis rtogs so// nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gang lags//
26a6(mdo sde): pa de yang bdag gis rtogs lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhi ni de gang yin/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal rtogs pa ma mchis shing
26a7(mdo sde): rnam par rtogs pa ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin ni nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin lags so// tshul bzhin ma lags pa ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin ni nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin lags so//
26b1(mdo sde): mongs pa rnams ni glo bur te/ stong pa nyid rtogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so// mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i shes pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so// rang bzhin gyis
26b2(mdo sde): 'od gsal ba dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ dug drug pa'i sbrul gdug pas bltas pa tsam gyis skye bo 'gum par 'gyur ba las/ der mi zhig gi
26b3(mdo sde): dug thams cad 'jil ba dang / dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa'i sman gnod sel zhes bgyi ba 'tshal te mchis nas/ de nas sman de bstan ma thag tu sprul gdug pa'i dug de ma
26b4(mdo sde): mchis bgyis nas/ de la khye'u dang bu mo rnams rdze bas rtse zhing / khye'u dang bu mo de dag sbrul gdug pa de dang lhan cig tu rtse bar bgyid de/ pang par len cing glo la se ral 'phreng du btags/
26b5(mdo sde): te/ rgyan du bgyis kyang tshig par mi bgyid/ za bar mi bgyid/ sdug bsngal du mi brjid do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du bdag kyang sngon chos 'dul ba ma thos pa na/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa/
26b6(mdo sde): yid la bgyid pa phyin ci log las nye bar gnas pa'i nyon mongs pas yongs su bsregs pa na/ 'dod chags kyi rang gi lus la chags shing / rang gi gzugs la mngon par zhen
26b7(mdo sde): gzugs dbu ba lta bur so sor rtogs par mi bgyid/ lus sgyu ma'i chos nyid du ma 'tshal/ dga' ba'i rtsed mo rmi lam lta bur ma 'tshal/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i ro myang ba sbrang rtsi'i
27a1(mdo sde): thigs pa lta bur ma 'tshal/ srog gi dbang po zil ba'i thigs pa lta bur ma 'tshal/ 'du byed thams nad mi rtag par ma 'tshal/ lus mi sdug par mi 'tshan
27a2(mdo sde): 'du byed thams cad shin tu sdug sngal bar ma 'tshal cing / chos thams cad bdag ma mchis par so sor rtogs par mi bgyid de/ bdag kyang mun pa mun nag gis bai sgribs shing
27a3(mdo sde): gzhan la yang mun par bgyid/ bdag kyang bcings shing / gzhan la yang bcing bar bgyid pa las/ 'jam dpal gang gi tshe/ bdag gris khyod las chos dang ldan pa'i bkra'
27a4(mdo sde): mchid thos te/ thos nas kyang mos shing / mos nas kyang rnam par grol te/ de'i slad du bdag da ltar dang / slan chad chags pa'i mig gis su la yang blta bar mi bgyid do//
27a5(mdo sde): de ci'i slad du zhes na/ 'jam dpal snang ba ni mun pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'dod chags dang bral ba ni su yang nyon mongs pa rnams la chags pa ma
27a6(mdo sde): mchis pa'i slad du'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma 'jam dpal lha'i
27a7(mdo sde): 'khor dang / me'i 'khor chen po 'di 'dus kyis/ gang gis lha dang mi 'di dag gis nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin de dag rtogs nas/ sems can rnams la snying rje bas bla na med
27b1(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi bka' mchi bgyi bar khrod stobs pa mdzod cig/ 'jam dngal gyis smras pa/ sring po nyon mong
27b2(mdo sde): ba'i rang bzhin la ni mos par dka'a'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sring monyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin ni/ byang chub min pa'i phyir ro// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ me ma skar pa ni skrag
27b3(mdo sde): pa'i bdag nyid ma yin no// sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang yongs su ma brtags na/ 'khor ba'i bdag nyid ma yin no// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ me sbar na ni sreg pa'i
27b4(mdo sde): bdag nyid yin no// sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang yongs su brtags na/ 'khor ba'i bdag nyid yin no// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ me ni rgyu yod na 'bar ro// sring mo de
27b5(mdo sde): bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang lta ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i rgyu yod na/ khams gsum du 'bar ro// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ me ni rgyu med na mi 'bar ro// sring mo de bzhin du nyon mong
27b6(mdo sde): pa rnams kyang lta ba'i kun nas ltung ba'i rgyu med na/ khams gsum du mi 'bar ro// snying mo 'di lta ste dper na/ lo stong du 'bar ba'i me lo ni sgru ba dang 'bri ba med do// sring mo de bzhin
27b7(mdo sde): du bskal pa brgya stong du rgyu ba'i nyon mongs pa la yang skye ba dang 'bri ba med do// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na/ me shi ba la ni ma zhes mi gdags so// sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs par
28a1(mdo sde): #/ shes par zhi ba la yang / snron mongs pa zhes mig dgas so// snying mo 'di lta sa dper na/ namA ma khal gang la me pa srung / rnam nam
28a2(mdo sde): tshig par mi nus so// sring mo de bzhin du gang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba la/ glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa 'byung yang / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de ni/ glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa des
28a3(mdo sde): kun nas nyon mongs par byed mi nus so// sring mo 'di ltar yang gzugs kyi lus la ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ mtsho bran gyi cheb kyi nang gi chuH
28a4(mdo sde): bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo phung po rnams ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ de bzhin gsheg pa'i sprul pa bzhin du'o//
28a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khams rnams ji ltar blta bar bya// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ khams gsum bskal pa'i mos bsreg par gyur pa/
28a6(mdo sde): de bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo skye mched rnams ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ mngon par 'du bya ba'i las mngon
28a7(mdo sde): por 'dus ma bgyis pa bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'khor 'di ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ 'khor 'di ni steng gi
28b1(mdo sde): nam mkha'i mtshams bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod nyid ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ bdag pu dang mya gnyis
28b2(mdo sde): phrad pa bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ long ba gzugs la ji lta ba bzhin du'o// 'jum
28b3(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis 'di dag thos sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ sgyu ma sprul pa'i rna ba'i rnam par rig pa lta bus thos lags so// /
28b4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod dam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag nyid byang chub lags te/
28b5(mdo sde): yang 'dod par mi bgyid do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa spyad dam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gis nyon mongs pa thams
28b6(mdo sde): cad gtan du yongs su btang bas spyad lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas sam/ bu mos
28b7(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal nam mkha' yongs su rdzogs pas yongs su rdzogs par bgyis lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
29a1(mdo sde): pa bsgoms sum/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pas bsgoms lags so// 'jam/
29a2(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtsams sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad thob pa ru bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis brtsam
29a3(mdo sde): lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad kyi dbyings gnas pa ma
29a4(mdo sde): mchis pa'i tshul gyis bdag gnas lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas sam/ bu mos smras pa
29a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal lhag chad ma mchis par yongs su rdzogs par bgyis lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis byams pa bsgoms sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal
29a6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad mi srid pa'i tshul gyis bsgoms lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po gang nas btsal bar bya/ bu mos smras pa
29a7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas snying rje chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las btsal bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te sems can rnams kyi nyon
29b1(mdo sde): mongs pa ma mchis par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skye bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal gyis sgrus pa//
29b2(mdo sde): bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba ga las btsal bar bya/ bums smras pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'i phying chub kyi sems lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smra smra ba/
29b3(mdo sde): bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i btang snyoms ci zhig byed/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i btang snyoms ni/ sems can thams cad mi bslub yongs su rdzogs
29b4(mdo sde): bar bgyid pa dang / chos thams cad la 'gal ba ma mchis par nye bar mchi bar bgyid pa'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'gral ba zhes bgyi ba ji lta bu yin/ bu mos smras pa/
29b5(mdo sde): gang dag ma mchis pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rnams spang ba'i slad du byang chub la rab tu zhugs pa dag go// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ de dag gang dang 'gal/ bu mos smras pa phas
29b6(mdo sde): kyis rgol ba thams cad dang ngo // 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo phas kyi rgol ba dag gang yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang dag bzod pa'i rlom sems kyis gzhan la rgol ba dag/
29b7(mdo sde): lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo bzod pa zhes bya ba ga las 'od / bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyis mtho btsam pa las mchi'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ mtsho/
30a1(mdo sde): bcas pa ma mchis na/ brjod pa ci yang ma mchis pa'i ma duH/ 'dus dpal gang lasams can gang gis mamo brtsam pa na/ bajug pa sa
30a2(mdo sde): gnang pa mi bgyid pa de bzod pa bsgoms pa lags so// 'jam dbul gyis smras pa/ bu mo khong khro ba zhes bya ba ji lta bu man/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jas dkyil gang gis bskul pa
30a3(mdo sde): brgyar bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams las gnod par bgyid pa de ni khong khro ba zhes bgyid/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo bzod pa zhes bu ba ji lta bu yin/ bu mos smras pa
30a4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gang gi sems la zhe 'gras pa ma mchis shing / yul thams cad la gnod pa mi bya ba ste/ de ni bzod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
30a5(mdo sde): bu mo ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba yin/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang chos thams cad la rnam par 'byed kyang mi dmigs pa legs so//
30a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa bu mo ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang bdud thams cad 'dul bar bgyid kyang / nyon mong/
30a7(mdo sde): pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni phung po rnams kyang bstan kyang / phung po'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas pa dang / 'jam
30b1(mdo sde): dnga' byang chub sems dpa' mnyan mongs pa rnams ston byung / rang bzhin rgyas nyid kyis rgyags pa ma mchis pa dang / 'das dpar byang rgyab mas y-i/
30b2(mdo sde): sbyin par bgyi ba'i slad du ma pa dang 'chi ba sngon kyang / chos thams cad la 'chi 'gro dang / 'gro ba ma mchis par rab tu rtogs pa dang / 'jam dang la byang chub sems dpa' ni rtswa'i bu daH/
30b3(mdo sde): skyon kyang / phrag dog dang / rlom sems can thams cad dang bral ba'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar sems can yongs su smin par
30b4(mdo sde): byed/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang / thabs yongs su bsgoms pas sems can yongs su smin par bgyid do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
30b5(mdo sde): bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi drung du gnas par bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal rang gi sems dang shes pa yongs su bsgoms pas/ byang chub sems
30b6(mdo sde): dpas sems can thams cad kyi drung du gnas par bgyi'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'khor 'di ni khyod la chos nyan par 'dod do// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang
30b7(mdo sde): du bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes 'jug pa de ni/ nyan par 'tshal ba ma lags la/ gang la rna ba'i rnam par rig pas rnam par shes pa 'jug na yang / nyan par 'tshal ba ma lags so//
31a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo chos nyan par 'dod pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/ bu mos smras pa / 'jam dpal gang gi tshe rang gi lus la rmi lam gyi mi lta
31a2(mdo sde): bur mos pa dang / ston pa'i chos de la yang brag cha'i skra skad lta bur mos shing myos pa dang / rnam par grol ba yang gnyis su mi bgyid pa de tsam gyis nA/ chos nyan par 'tshal ba lags
31a3(mdo sde): so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo chos ji ltar mnyan par bya/ bu mos smras pa/ chos la rton pa nan tan bgyi don chos mnyan par bgyi'o// de nas 'jam
31a4(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i shes rab kyis smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis de lta de ltar chos bstan
31a5(mdo sde): pa na/ 'khor de las srog chags khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa sngon dge ba'i/
31a6(mdo sde): rtsa ba bsags pa'i lha dang mi lnga brgya ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba
31a7(mdo sde): rnam par dag go// bu mo de yang chos nyan pa'i dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bas/ chos rnams la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// des bzod pa thob nas/ 'jam/
31b1(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa la gtugs te/ 'jam dpal thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ bdag rab tu 'byung du gsol/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa kun bskyed pa/ 'phags pa
31b2(mdo sde): ma lags pa/ 'phags pa'i chos las nyams par bgyid pa'i lus 'di lus 'di las thar par mdzad du gsol zhes rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba btab bo// 'jam dpal gyis
31b3(mdo sde): smras pa/ sring mo 'di lta ste/ mgo'i sgra 'dreg pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bu mo gang sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa
31b4(mdo sde): gcod pa'i phyir brtson pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro// bu mo gang gos ngur smrig 'chang ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi
31b5(mdo sde): bu mo gang bdag nyid kyang bslab pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can rnams kyang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa dang / brtul zhugs la yang dag
31b6(mdo sde): par sbyor bar byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bu mo gang bdag nyid dben par gnas pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ bu mo
31b7(mdo sde): gang 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na rnam par rgyug pa'i sems can rnams dben par shes pa la 'god par byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems depa'i rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'o// kha rog dang /
32a1(mdo sde): gzugs kyi rtags dang / spyod lam gyi dbyibs ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan dag la byams pa dang //
32a2(mdo sde): snying rje ba'i sems bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi sems can
32a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lhag pa'i bsami pa la gus pa ni zla byang chub sems
32a4(mdo sde): dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can gzhan yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la gus pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bdag
32a5(mdo sde): gi nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin no// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu
32a6(mdo sde): 'byung ba yin no// bdag gi sems rjes su bsrung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi sems rjes su bsrung ba ni/ byang
32a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bdag thar par bya ba la brtson pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad thar par bya ba
32b1(mdo sde): la brtson pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bu mo bdag 'khor bas spro ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi// sems can thams cad 'khon
