182b3(mdo sde): mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ma'o zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ngur pa'i tshig go// bka' stsal
182b4(mdo sde): pa 'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ni thams cad kyi thams cad ma mchis la/ thams cad mkhyen
182b5(mdo sde): nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ste/ de'i slad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa'o zhes bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni su la yang thob par bgyi//
182b6(mdo sde): ba'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni sems can gyi rang bzhin te/ de'i slad du de phur pa'i tshig go// bcom
182b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das sems can ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur ba'i tshig ces bya/ 'jam
183a1(mdo sde): dpal gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad ni ngo bo nyid ma mchis shing ngo bo nyid dang bral ba ste/ ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i mtshan nyid pas/
183a2(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su mchis pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin can te de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go/ bcom ldan 'das sems can
183a3(mdo sde): thams cad byang chub kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
183a4(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba'i tshig gi don ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi snying po zhes bya ba ni/ chos thams cad zhi ba'i snying po'o// /
183a5(mdo sde): chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i snying po'o// chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i snying po'o// chos thams cad bzung du med pa'i snying po'o// chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i snying po ste/
183a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de ni byang chub kyi snying po'i tshig gi don to// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na sems can thams cad snying po de dang rtag par ldan pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
183a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar rnam grangs des kyang / sems can thams cad ni byang chub kyi snying po ste/ de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i
183b1(mdo sde): tshig go/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams nad ni bzod pa thob bo zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig gro/ bka' stsal pa/ 'dzum dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya
183b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad ni mi zad pa'i chos dang / mi sgrib pa'i chos dang / mi skye ba'i chos can te/ ming gi mtshan nyid kyis dben pa'i
183b3(mdo sde): bzod pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rjes su mchis pas/ de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa can no zhes bgyi ba 'di ni pur
183b4(mdo sde): pa'i tshig go// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyis gang ci yang rung ste/
183b5(mdo sde): gang dang gang spobs par gyur pa de dang de ni phyogs bcu kun na yang ma mchis to// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad sgrib pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su mchis shing / dben la rang gi/
183b6(mdo sde): mtshan nyid la gnas pas de ltar de dag ma mchis pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad gzungs thob
183b7(mdo sde): bo zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya'ajam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad
184a1(mdo sde): ni sems can gyi 'du shes can te/ yang dag pa ma lags par yongs su brtags pa'i phyin ci log gi rtog pas mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i slad du/ gzugs
184a2(mdo sde): dang sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg rnams 'dzin pas de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba 'di//
184a3(mdo sde): ni phur pa'i tshig go/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad ni sems can ma/
184a4(mdo sde): mchis pa ste/ rang bzhin gyis gnod sems ma mchis shing / gnod sems dang byams pa brtag tu ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid thob pas/ de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go// bcom
184a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das sems can thams cad snying rje chen po dang ldan no zhes bya ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/ 'jam dpal gyis
184a6(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad ni ma bcos ma bgyis pa'i snying rje can te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnyam pa nyid las ma 'das pa snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid dang /
184a7(mdo sde): ldan pas/ de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dang
184b1(mdo sde): ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad ni dmigs pa'i dben pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa ste/ bcom ldan
184b2(mdo sde): 'das dmigs pa gang gis sems can gang gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ba de ni dmigs pa de la ma 'khrugs pa ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dmigs pa'i rnam par
184b3(mdo sde): shes pa rnams skad cig ma'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad 'dod chags dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba'i de ni phur pa'i tshig go/
184b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad ni 'dod chags dang ldan pa ste/ 'dod chags kyi
184b5(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid dang ldan zhing rjes su rtog pas mnyam pa nyid las ma 'das te/ dgyes shing rab tu dgyes pa rnam par dgyes te/ nyon mongs pa mi mnga' bas na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags
184b6(mdo sde): 'di ni byang chub ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags kyi ngo bo nyid rjes su rtogs pas/ byang chub ces bgyi ste/ de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go// bcom ldan 'das
184b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni zhe sdang dang ldan pa'o zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya// 'jam dpal gyis
185a1(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/ zhe sdang mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs shing / 'du byed thams cad kyi skyon yang dag par ston pa ste/
185a2(mdo sde): zhe sdang gi ngo bo nyid rjes su rtogs pas// zhe sdang dang ldan pa zhes bgyi ste/ de'i slad du de ni phur ba'i tshig go// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gti mug dang ldan no//
185a3(mdo sde): zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur po'i tshig ces bya/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
185a4(mdo sde): rnams ni gti mug gi ngo bo nyid rjes su rtogs pas/ gti mug mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs shing / ming thams cad las 'grel pa ste/ de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go// bcom ldan 'das
185a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig tshogs dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/ 'jam dpal gyis
185a6(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig tshogs la bzhugs pa ste/ 'jig tshogs mi skye mi 'byung bar thugs su chud pas/ chos thams cad kyis
185a7(mdo sde): rgyas par mi 'gyur/ rnam par rgyas par mi 'gyur/ yongs su rgyas par mi 'gyur te/ mi bzhugs pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pas/ de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go/ bcom ldan 'das
185b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams log par lta ba dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur ba'i tshig go// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/ 'jam dpal
185b2(mdo sde): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dus byas log par yang dag par ston cing / 'dus byas yang dag pa ma lags par yang dag par ston
185b3(mdo sde): 'dus byas nor ba yang dag par ston pa ste/ logs par lta ba'i ngo bo nyid mtshan nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pas/ 'dus byas thams cad gsob gsog ste/
185b4(mdo sde): bslu ba'i chos can du ston par mdzad pas/ de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis phyin ci log la gnas te/ byang chub brnyos/
185b5(mdo sde): so zhes bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sgrib pa la gnas/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la gnas/ 'dod chags la gnas/ zhe sdang la gnas/ ga
185b6(mdo sde): mug la gnas te/ byang chub brnyes so zhes bgyi ba de ni phur pa'i tshig go// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir de ni phur pa'i tshig ces bya/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom
185b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das gnas zhes bgyi ba 'di ni log par gnas pa'i tshig go// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal log par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don ci/ 'jam
186a1(mdo sde): dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das log par gnas pa/ smad par gnas pa g.yo ba/ rab tu g.yo ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni/ so so'i skye bo rnams kyi/
186a2(mdo sde): tshig bla dgas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dod chags mnyam pa nyid dang / zhe sdang mnyam pa nyid dang / gti mug mnyam pa nyid dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mnyam pa//
186a3(mdo sde): nyid dang / sgrib pa mnyam pa nyid dang shA phyin ci log mnyam pa nyid la yang dag par bzhugs shing legs par bzhugs pa ste/ de dag ni 'dod chags kyi ngo bo nyid kyi gnas na bzhug bzhin
186a4(mdo sde): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhe sdang gi ngo bo nyid kyi gnas na bzhugs/ gti mug gi ngo bo nyid kyi gnas na bzhugs/ 'dod pa'i
186a5(mdo sde): yon tan lnga'i ngo bo nyid kyi gnas na bzhugs/ sgrib pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi gnas na bzhugs phyin ci log gi ngo bo nyid kyi gnas na bzhugs bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
186a6(mdo sde): chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal khyod la/
186a7(mdo sde): gal te la la zhig gis/ 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa/ dge ba'i chos thams
186b1(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'o zhes zer zhing de skad ces 'dri na/ lan ji skad ces gdab/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te la la zhig bdag la de skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
186b2(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa/ dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa'o zhes mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad ces 'bri/
186b3(mdo sde): ba de la/ bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyi ste/ re shes dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la rim gro gyis shig/ rnal 'byor la brtson par gyis shig/ chos gang la yang sbyar ba dang / dbye ba ma
186b4(mdo sde): byed cig/ bzung ba dang btang bar ma byed cig/ dmigs pa dang rnam par dmigs par ma byed cig/ btang snyoms dang spang bar ma byed cig/ tshol ba dang smon par ma byed cig/ chos
186b5(mdo sde): gang la yang rab ce'am/ tha ma zhe 'am/ mchog ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta zhig dang / de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul shes par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
186b6(mdo sde): pa'i yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ yul dang bral zhing yul med pa/ yul thams cad dang yang dag par bral ba/ chos yang dag par chad pa'o zhes bgyi'o// bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal
186b7(mdo sde): khyod kyis de skad ces lung bstan na/ ci zhig lung bstan par 'gyur/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de skad ces lung bstan pas chos gang yang lung bstan rab gyur pa ma mchis so//
187a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi snying po la zhugs pa'i tshe/ chos la la'i skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa gang yang gzig sam/
187a2(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes shing ma byang ladage ba'i chos dang ldan pa yang ma lagasami dag/
187a3(mdo sde): ba dang ldan pa yang ma lags pa de la yongs su shes par bgyi ba ni gang zhig mchis/ spang ba ni ci zhig mchis/ bsgom pa ni gang zhig mchis/ mngon du bgyi ba ni gang zhig mchis/ mngon/
187a4(mdo sde): par rtogs par bgyi ba grang zhig mchis/ de nas steng gi bar snang las lha'i bu stong phrag bcus de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pa
187a5(mdo sde): dang / ku mud dang / pud+d+ha ri ka dang / man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen pos mngon par gtor/ rab tu gtor nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam
187a6(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal zhing / 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chags pa ma mchis pa'i dpal te/ de ni 'jam dpal lo// bcom
187a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di ni mi gnyis pa'i dpal te/ de ni 'jam dpal lo// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i dpal te/ de ni 'jam dpal lo// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni nyon mong pa/
187b1(mdo sde): ma mchis pa'i dpal te/ de ni 'jam dpal lo// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de bzhin nyid kyi dpal te/ de ni 'jam dpal lo// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi dpal te/
187b2(mdo sde): de ni 'jam dpal lo// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos kyi dbyings kyi dpal te/ de ni 'jam dpal lo// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i dpal te/ de ni 'jam dpal lo// bcom
187b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di ni dam pa'i dpal te/ de ni 'jam dpal lo// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni mchog gi dpal te/ de ni 'jam dpal lo// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni phul gyi dpal te / de ni 'jam
187b4(mdo sde): dpal lo// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bla na ma mchis pa'i dpal te/ de ni 'jam dpal lo// de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces/
187b5(mdo sde): smras so// lha'i bu dag chog gis bdag la ma rtog rnam par ma rtog cig/ kho bos ni chos gang yang dam pa zhes bya ba 'am/ mchog ces bya ba 'am/ phul zhes bya ba de lta bu yang dag par
187b6(mdo sde): rjes su ma mthong ngo // lha'i bu dag kho bo ni 'dod chags kyi dpal te/ de'i phyir kho bo 'jam dpal lo// kho bo ni zhe sdang gi dpal te/ de'i phyir kho bo 'jam dpal lo// kho bo ni gti mug gi
187b7(mdo sde): dpal te/ de'i phyir kho bo 'jam dpal lo// lha'i bu dag kho bo ni 'dod chags las yongs su 'das pa ma yin/ zhe sdang las yongs su 'das pa ma yin/ gti mug las yong su 'das pa ma
188a1(mdo sde): yin te/ lha'i bu dag byis pa so so'i skye bo dag ni 'da' zhing yongs su 'da' ba dang / rnam par 'da' ba dag byed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos gang la yang /
188a2(mdo sde): 'pho ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ 'da' ba med do// lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'o na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rnam par mi gnon tam/ sA bcu
188a3(mdo sde): rjes su mi gnon tam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag de ji snyam du sems sgyu mas sprul pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba dag sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par gnon cing
188a4(mdo sde): sa bcu rjes su gnon pa yod dam/ lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gnas kyang med na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par gnon pa'am/ sa rjes su
188a5(mdo sde): gnon pa lta ga la yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ de dag ni gnon pa med/ rnam par gnon pa med/ yongs su gnon pa
188a6(mdo sde): med de 'da' ba med do// lha'i bu dag gis smras pa/ 'o na 'jam dpal khyod byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ram/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa ka/ lha'i bu dag de rje/
188a7(mdo sde): snyam du sems/ byis pa so so'i skye bo 'dod chags kyis kun nas glags pa zhig byang chub kyi snying por 'dug na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ram/ lha'i bu
188b1(mdo sde): dag gis smras pa/ ci 'jam dpal 'o na khyod 'dod chags kyis kun nas glags pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo yin nam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu dag de de bzhin te/ bdag
188b2(mdo sde): ni 'dod chags kyis kun nas grags pa'o// zhe sdang gis kun nas grogs pa'o// gti mug gis kun nas grags pa'o// bdag ni mu stegs can gzhan mo// log par zhen pa'o//
188b3(mdo sde): lha'i bu dag gis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci las bsams te de skad du bdag ni 'dod chags kyis kun nas glags pa'o// zhe sdang gis kun nas glug pa'o// gti mug gis kun nas/
188b4(mdo sde): glags pa'o zhes smra/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag de ni ji ltar mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi ngo bo nyid la gnas pa'i phyir// ji ltar
188b5(mdo sde): phyogs bcu kun tu gnas med pa de ltar gnas so// lha'i bu drag gis smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ji ltar mu stegs can gzhan zhes bya ba yin/ smras pa/ lha'i bu dag kho bo ni mu stegs
188b6(mdo sde): can gzhan du mi 'gro ste/ de'i phyir mu stegs can gzhan zhes bya'o// lha'i bu dag gis smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ji ltar ldog pa la zhen ces bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
188b7(mdo sde): lha'i bu dag kho bos ni chos thams cad log par shes te yang dag pa ma yin no// nor ba yongs su brtags par khong du chud pas/ de'i phyir kho bo ni log pa la zhen pa'o// de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu
189a1(mdo sde): stong phrag bcu po de dag gis 'jam dpal las bstan pa de thos nas nami skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// 'di skad ces kyang smras te/ rdo rje'i tshig dang /
189a2(mdo sde): sa bon gyi tshig dang / phur pa'i tshig rnam pa 'di lta bu dag gang gi rnalam du grag par gyur pa de dag kyang thob pa 'dra ba legs par thob pa yin na/ gang gis thos nas mos par gyur pa
189a3(mdo sde): dang/ yid ches pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sbyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa lta spos kyang ci dgos te/ de dag ni thos
189a4(mdo sde): ba med pa'i spobs pa rjes su thos par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad la snang ba thos par 'gyur ro// tshul gcig tu bstan pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang
189a5(mdo sde): sbyor bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/ de nas bcom
189a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das la/ lha'i bu pad+mo rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dus slad ma la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos
189a7(mdo sde): thos na/ mi 'jigs mi dang skrag par mi 'gyur ba dang / sgra thams cad rtogs par 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / thogs pa ma mchis shing the tshom ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du/ smang
189b1(mdo sde): tshig la 'jug pa'i rig pa bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bu pad+mo rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
189b2(mdo sde): lha'i bu khyod la gnas de dris pas ci zhig bya/ chog mod/ sgra dang skad la 'jug pa 'di ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpas shes pa 'am/ khong du chud pa 'am bsam pa 'am
189b3(mdo sde): gzhal ba 'am/ dpyad par sla ba ma yin no// de ni byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i mdun du brjod par bya ba ma yin te/ lha'i bu sgra dang skad la 'jug pa khong du chud pa'i byang chub
189b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ gal te bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ log pa'i tshig yang dag pa ma yin pa'i ngag gis mi snyan par brjod de/ spyos kyang de la khong khro ba'i
189b5(mdo sde): sems mi skyed do// gal te bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bde ba'i yo byad gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad thams cad kyis rim gro byas/ bkur sti
189b6(mdo sde): byas bsti stang du byas/ mchod pa byas kying / de la chags pa'i sems mi 'byung ste/ lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni chags par bya ba'i gnas kyi chos thams
189b7(mdo sde): cad la yang chags par mi 'gyur/ khong khro bar bya ba'i gnas kyi chos thams cad la yang khong khro bar mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu de bzhin du sgra dang skad la 'jug pa khong du chud pa'i byang chub
190a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang bskal bA gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bde bu'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas kyang / de la chags pa'i sems mi skyed do// bskal pa gang+gA'i
190a2(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed du log pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig gis mi snyan par brjod de spyos kyang / khong khro ba'i sems mi skyed do// lha'i bu de ltar sgra dang skad la 'jug pa khong du chud pa'i byeng/
190a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ni thob pa dang / ma thob pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang / bstod pa dang / smad pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad kyi se me bskyod mi 'phrog pa ste
190a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad zil gyis mnan cing / ri'i rgyal po ltar mi bskul bar gnas so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i bu pad+mo rnam par rol
190a5(mdo sde): pa'i mngon par shes pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang ma byung ba'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes sbyang ba/ 'du shes byang ba gang ji snyed cig 'byung
190a6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba de dag gis sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa 'di thos na/ gang gi skyon dag kyang rtag par 'gyur/ gzhan la yang ston par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das sgra dang spyad la 'jug
190a7(mdo sde): pa'i rig pa bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsel ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bu pad+mo rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'o
190b1(mdo sde): de bas na shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / don 'di ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ lha'i bu pad+mo rnam par rol pa'i mngon/
190b2(mdo sde): par shes pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ltar nyan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi
190b3(mdo sde): sgra la nyes pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur zhing / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgra la chags pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo// zhe sdang gi sgra la kha na ma tho
190b4(mdo sde): ba'i 'du shes su 'gyur zhing / zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sgra la legs pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo// gti mug gi sgra lA kha na ma tho ba'i 'du shes
190b5(mdo sde): su 'gyur zhing / gti mug dang bral ba'i sgra la legs pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo// 'dod pa chung ba'i sgra la chags shing / 'dod pa che ba'i sgra/
190b6(mdo sde): la khong khro na/ sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo// chog shes pa'i sgra la chags shing / chog mi shes pa'i sgra la khong khre na/ sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo//
190b7(mdo sde): sdom pa'i sgra la chags shing / me sdom pa'i sgra la khong khro na/ sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo// gcig pur dga' ba'i sgral chags shing / skye bo phal po che'i sbal lo
191a1(mdo sde): khro na/ sgra dang gad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi skyob bo// sangs rgyas kyi sgral chags shing / mu stegs can gyi sbrul khong khro na/ sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i
191a2(mdo sde): rig pa la mi slob bo// tshangs par spyod sbrul zhen cing / tshangs pa mi spyod pa'i sgra la zhe sdang na/ sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo// kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgra la khong
191a3(mdo sde): khro zhing / rnam par byang ba'i sgra la chagros nu/ sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo// 'bras bu la gnas pa'i sgra la chags shing / byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sgra la khong khro na/
191a4(mdo sde): sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo// bde ba'i sgra la chags shing / sdug bsngal gyi sgra la khong khro na/ sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo// rab tu byung ba'i sgral
191a5(mdo sde): chags shing // khyim pa'i sbrul khong khro na/ sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgral chags shing / 'jig rten pa'i sbrul khong khro ni/ sgra dang skun
191a6(mdo sde): la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo// sbyin pa'i sgra la legs pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur zhing / ser sna'i ska la khong khro ba'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob po/
191a7(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi sgra la chags pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur zhing / tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sgra la khong khro ba'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo// bzod
191b1(mdo sde): pa'i sgra la legs pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur zhing / gnod sems kyi sgra la khong khro ba'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo// brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i sgra la
191b2(mdo sde): legs pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur zhing / le lo'i sgra la khong khro ba'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo// bsam gtan pa'i sgra la legs pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur
191b3(mdo sde): zhing / 'khrugs pa'i sgra la khong khro ba'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo// shes rab kyi sgra la legs pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur zhing / shes rab 'chal pa'i
191b4(mdo sde): sgra la khong khro ba'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo// nye ba'i sgra la gnas shing / ring ba'i sgra la khong khro na/ sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo//
191b5(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i sgra la kha na ma tho ba'i 'du shes su 'gyur zhing / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra la legs pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/ sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo// tshu rol gyi
191b6(mdo sde): sgra la khong khro zhing / pha rol gyi sgra la chags na/ sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo// grong gi sgra la kha na ma tho bar 'du shes par gyur cing / dgon pa'i sgra la chags par gyur na/
191b7(mdo sde): sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo// gcig pu spyod pa'i sgra la chags shing / 'du 'dzir spyod pa'i sgra la khong khro na/ sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo// dge slong
192a1(mdo sde): gi spyod pa la chags shing / khyim pa'i spyod pa la khong khro na/ sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo// spyod lam gyi bya ba la chags shing / spyod lam ma yin pa'i/
192a2(mdo sde): bya ba la khong khro na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo// tshul du shis pa la chags shing / tshul du mi shis pa la khong khro na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi sgrub bo// tshul khrims
192a3(mdo sde): kyi spyod pa la chags shing / tshul khrims 'chal pa'i spyod pa la khong khro na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo// ma 'dres pa'i spyod pa la chags shing / 'dres pa'i spyod pa la khong khro na/
192a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i spyod pa la chags shing / 'dod chags kyi spyod pa la khong khro ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo// zhe sdang/
192a5(mdo sde): med pa'i 'du shes la chags shing / zhe sdang gi 'du shes la khong khro na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo// gti mug dang bral ba'i 'du shes la chags shing / gti mug/
192a6(mdo sde): gi 'du shes lnga khong khro na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi skyob bo// stong pa nyid la chags shing / dmigs pa la khong khro na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo// mtshan ma med
192a7(mdo sde): pa la chags shing / mtshan ma la khong khro na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo// smon pa med pa la chags shing / sman pa la khong khro na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob po//
192b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la chags shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa la khong khro na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo// byang chub sems dpa' la ltung bas rgol
192b2(mdo sde): na byang chub las ring du 'gyur te/ las kyi sgrib pa yongs su 'dzin to// spyod pa la 'phyan byang chub las ring du 'gyur ro// spyod lam gyis rgol na byang chub las ring du 'gyur ro//
192b3(mdo sde): gal te byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa' la dma' ba'i 'du shes bskyed de/ bdag la che ba'i 'du shes bskyed na/ bdag la rma 'byung ste/ las kyi sgrib pa yang yongs su 'dzin to//
192b4(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' gdams shing rjes su bstan na/ ston pa'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag ste/ gdams shing rjes su bstan par bya'o// gal te des byang chub
192b5(mdo sde): yongs su ma btang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ni ji ltar byang chub sems
192b6(mdo sde): dpa' gnyis pa la brten te/ chad par 'gyur ba de ltar gang gis kyang yongs su chad par mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsrung
192b7(mdo sde): bar 'dod cing / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su sbyang bar 'dod pa dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa myur du thob par 'dod pas/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du
193a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thams cad la phyag bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/
193a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal te/ 'dod chags kyi sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o// zhe sdang gi sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de ni mtshu/
193a3(mdo sde): pa'o/ gti mug gi sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o// mu stegs can gyi sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o// 'dod pa chung ba'i sgra dang / 'dod pa che ba'i sgra dri ni
193a4(mdo sde): mtshungs pa'o// chog shes pa'i sgra dang / chog mi shes pa'i sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o// sdom pa'i sgra dang / mi sdom pa'i sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o// gcig pur dga' ba'i sgra dang / 'du 'dzi'i
193a5(mdo sde): sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o// tshu rol gyi sgra dang / pha rol gyi sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o// ring ba'i sgra dang / nye ba'i sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o// 'khor ba'i sgra dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o//
193a6(mdo sde): grong gi sgra dang / dgon pa'i sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o// sbyin pa'i sgra dang / ser sna'i sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o// tshul khrims kyi sgra dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o//
193a7(mdo sde): bzod pa'i sgra dang / gnod sems kyi sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi sgra dang / le lo'i sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o// bsam gtan gyi sgra dang / 'khrug pa'i sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o//
193b1(mdo sde): shes rab kyi sgra dang / shes rab 'chal pa'i sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o// de nas lha'i bu pad+mo rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
193b2(mdo sde): smras so// 'jam dpal ci'i phyir de dag mtshungs zhes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'dod chags kyi sgra la khyod ji ltar sems/ lha'i bus smras pa/ zag cha dang 'dra bar shes
193b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu'o na sangs rgyas kyi sgra la khyod kyis ji ltar shes/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de yang sgra brnyan gyi mnyam pa nyid las ma 'das pa'o// 'jam dpal
193b4(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar de dag ni mtshungs pa yin par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
193b5(mdo sde): bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal khyod sngon las dang po pa'i sa la gnas shing / 'dri lta bu'i tshul khong du chud pa'i tshe/ las kyi sgrib pa ji lta bu dag mngon par dus byas pa lung ston cig dang
193b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal des ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa' dam 'cha' ba ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gis kyang de lta bu'i las kyi sgrib pa thob pa dang / rang rang bsrung bar 'gyur ro//
193b7(mdo sde): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// cis na bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar de lta bu'i su las kyi sgrib pa'i
194a1(mdo sde): nongs pa thos na yid mi bde bar yang 'gyur la su las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thob tu lags kyang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa thob par 'gyur lags pa
194a2(mdo sde): snyam/ bcom ldan 'das sngon 'das pa'i dus nu/ bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa shin tu yangs pa/ grangs las 'das pa yangs pa/ tshad ma mchis pa bsam gyis mi khyab
194a3(mdo sde): pa/ de'i pha rol/ de'i yang pha rol/ de'i dus de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i nga ro rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba rig pa dang rkang par
194a4(mdo sde): ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa ga skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/
194a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni/ dgung lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du gyur to// theg pa ni gsum gyis sems can rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar gyur to// 'jig rten
194a6(mdo sde): khams de'i ming ni snang ba chen po can zhes bgyi ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ni zhugs shing ngam/ ldum bu gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub par gyur te/
194a7(mdo sde): zhugs shing de dag las kyang 'di lta bu'i sgra 'byung ste/ gang 'di la stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i sgra dang / sman pa ma mchis pa'i sgra dang / skye ba ma mchis pa'i sgra dang / dngos
194b1(mdo sde): po ma mchis pa'i sgra dang / mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i sgra dang / rnam pa de lta bu'i sgra dag 'byung ste/ sgra byung ba de dag gis sems can de dag mngon par rtogs pa thob par gyur to// de bzhin//
194b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa de'i nyan thos kyi tshogs pa dang po ni/ dge slong bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i tshogs su gyur te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ khur bor ba / rang gi don rjes su
194b3(mdo sde): thob pa/ srid par sbyor ba yongs su bas pa/ bka' yang dag pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag gi tshogs su gyur to// tshogs gnyis pa ni dge slong bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa
194b4(mdo sde): drug gi tshogs su gyur to// tshogs gsum pa ni dge slong bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gsum gyi tshogs su gyur to// tshogs bzhi pa ni dge slong bya ba dgu bcu'i tshogs su gyur te/ thams cad
194b5(mdo sde): kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par sbyor ba yongs su byas pa/ bka' yang dag pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag gi
194b6(mdo sde): tshogs su gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyang grangs de snyed du gyur te/ thams cod kyang mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa/ tshul sna tshogs bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/
194b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po bsnyen bkur ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por rnam par grags pa/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang
195a1(mdo sde): po yang dag par sgrol ba sgo mtha' yas pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa sha stag gi tshogasas/
195a2(mdo sde): gyur te/ de la lags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las dang po pa dang / theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i
195a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyan du gyur pa de dag ni tshig brjod par bla ba ma lags so// de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ dam pa'i chos ni dgung lo stong phrag drug cu'i bar du gnas
195a4(mdo sde): par gyur te/ zhugs shing de dag las kyang sgra de dag de slan chad mi 'byung bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe dge slong byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba rab tu dga' ba'i dbang po zhes/
195a5(mdo sde): bgyi ba byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i dbang po de ni sngon spyod spyod pa ste/ spyod lam bcos mi 'tshal ba/ 'jig rten pa'i chos thams cad las slar log pa ma
195a6(mdo sde): mchis pa ste/ sems can de dag kyang dbang po rno zhing phye ba tsam gyis 'tshal la/ zab mo la mos pa sha stag ste/ de ni sems can de dag la 'dod pa chung ba'i bsngags pa yang mi brjod/ chog shes/
195a7(mdo sde): pa dang / sdom pa dang / gcig pur dga' ba'i bsngags pa yang mi brjod/ 'du 'dzi ma mchis pa'i bsngags pa yang mi brjod cing / des sems can de dag la chos thams cad ni 'dod chags kyi ngo
195b1(mdo sde): nyid do zhes bgyi bar bstan/ chos thams cad ni zhe sdang ging bo nyid do zhes bgyi bar bstan/ chos thams cad ni gti mug gi ngo bo nyid do zhes bgyi bar bstan/ chos thams cad ni sgrib pa med/
195b2(mdo sde): pa'o zhes bgyi bar bstan te/ des thabs des spyod pa thams cad kyang mtshan nyid gcig pa'o zhes bgyi bar bstan nas/ sems can thabs de lta bus bstan pa de dag kyang byang chub sems
195b3(mdo sde): dpa'i spyod pa la mi dga' bar ma gyur te/ khong khro ba'i sems ma mchis pa de dag bzod pa'i sa thob par gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yang mi phyed cing nges par gyur to//
195b4(mdo sde): de'i tshe dge slong byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bgyi ba byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bgyi ba de ni/ bsam gtan bzhi thob pa
195b5(mdo sde): gzugs ma mchis pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob ste/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis kyang yang dag par blangs te gnas par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal ba'i blo
195b6(mdo sde): gros kyis 'dul bar gyur pa de dag ni skyon 'dzin cing skyon brjod pa/ blo mi brtan pa sha stag tu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i blo gros bsod snyoms la spyod
195b7(mdo sde): ba zhig gi tshe ma rig nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i dbang po'i bslang ba'i grong der mchis te/ des sngon khyim bdag gi bu'i gnas shig mchis par mthong nas/ khyim bdag gi
196a1(mdo sde): bu gangan ba der mchis nas phyin pa dang / spyan bting ba la mchis te/ khyim bdag gi bu la 'dod pa chung ba'i bka' mchid brjod/ chog shes pa'i bka' mching brjod/ sdom pa'i
196a2(mdo sde): bka' mching brjod/ 'du 'dzi'i nongs pa brjod/ gcig pur dga' ba'i bsngags pa brjod/ 'du 'dzi ma mchis pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/ khyim bdag gi bu de'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga'
196a3(mdo sde): ba'i dbang po la mi snyan pa brjod pas/ dge slong de ni skye bo mang po log par bstan to// dge slong des ni skye bo mang po log par lta ba byas so// dge slong de ni 'du 'dzi'i nang na rnam par spyod pa ste/ 'dod chag ni
196a4(mdo sde): sgrib pa med do zhes ston to// zhe sdang ni sgrib pa med do zhes ston to// gti mug ni sgrib pa med do zhes ston to// chos thams cad ni sgrib pa med do zhes ston to zhes brjod pa dang / khyim bdag gi bu de yang
196a5(mdo sde): dbang po rno ba bzod pa thob pa zhig ste/ des dge slong de la smras pa/ btsun pa khyod kyis 'dod chags ji ltar mkhyen/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag gi bu 'dod chags ni kun nas nyon mongs par shes so//
196a6(mdo sde): smras pa/ btsun pa'o na 'dod chags de nang na mchis sam/ phyi rol na mchis/ smras pa/ 'dod chags ni nang na yang med/ phyi rol na yang med do// smras pa/ btsun pa de ltar 'dod chags nang na//
196a7(mdo sde): yang ma mchis/ phyi rol na yang ma mchis na/ shar phyogs na yang ma mchis/ lho phyogs na yang ma mchis/ nub phyogs na yang ma mchis/ byang phyogs na yang ma mchis/ steng na yang ma mchis
196b1(mdo sde): 'og na yang ma mchis/ phyogs mtshams rnams na yang ma mchis te/ de ltar lags na/ de ni ma skyes pa lags te/ gang la ma skyes pa de la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba'ang /
196b2(mdo sde): zhig mchis// de nas dge slong rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis bstan pa de thos nas/ 'khrugs te shin tu mi dga' nas/ bsod snyoms kyang ma blangs par stan las langs te mchis so// 'di skad
196b3(mdo sde): kyi tshig kyang brjod de/ kye ma dge slong des ni/ skye bo mang po log par bstan to zhes nas/ de khyim de nas byung ste/ dgon pa logs su mchis so// de slad kyis gtsug lag khang du mchis nas
196b4(mdo sde): dge slong lhag ma rnams la yang bsgo/ dge 'dun gyi nang du yang dge slong de mthong nas/ 'di skad du dge slong 'di ni skye bo mang po log par ston cing / dge slong 'di ni skye bo mang po log par lta bar byed de//
196b5(mdo sde): 'di ni 'dod chags ni sgrib pa med do zhes ston to// zhe sdang sgrib pa med do zhes ston to// gti mug sgrib pa med do zhes ston to// chos thams cad sgrib pa med do zhes ston to zhes bgyis so//
196b6(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i dbang po de 'di snyam du gyur te/ dge slong 'dis ni gdon mi za bar las kyi sgrib pa bsags par gyur gor ma chag na/ de la bdag gis zab mo'i
196b7(mdo sde): gtam bya'o// des ni ma nus na yang 'di'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom pa'i rgyu tsam du yang 'gyur ro snyam ste/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i dbang pos dge slong gi/
197a1(mdo sde): dge 'dun thams cad gcig tu 'dun par bgyis nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 'dod chags mya ngan 'das par gsungs// zhe sdang gti mug de
197a2(mdo sde): bzhin te// byang chub de dag gnas nyid yin// sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab// 'dod chags gang gis rnam brtags pa// zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin te// sangs rgyas byang chub de la ring
197a3(mdo sde): gnam dang sa gnyis ji bzhin no// byang chub 'dod chags gnyis su med// 'jug pa gcig pa mnyam nyid ldan pa ste// 'di dag chos la byis pa gang 'jigs pa// 'di dag sangs rgyas byang
197a4(mdo sde): chub ring ba yin// 'dod chags skye min 'jig pa ma yin te// sems kyang kun nas nyon mongs 'gyur ba med// gang zhig dmigs pa'i bdag la blo chags pa// 'dod chag ngan song de dag
197a5(mdo sde): lhung bar byed// gang zhing 'dod chags chos dang sangs rgyas chos// de dag khyad par gang yang med pa ste// yi ge gcig cing tshul gcig mtshan nyid med// de ltar shes pa bde gshegs nyid du/
197a6(mdo sde): 'gyur// tshul khrims 'tshal dang tshul khrims rnam brtags shing // gang zhig tshul khrims rlom pas mos gyur pa// dmigs pa'i lha la rab gnas de la ni// byang chub med cing sangs rgyas chos
197a7(mdo sde): kyang med// gang zhig dgon pa'i gnas lo rtog byed cing // bdag la stod byed gzhan la smod byed pa// dgon par lha la rab gnas de la ni// mtho ris med na byang chub ga la yod// byang chub lta ba
197b1(mdo sde): gnyis su med gsungs te// ming dang yi ge grangs dang sgra 'jug pa// de dag gang gis yang dag rtogs gyur pa// de la sangs rgyas byang chub ring ba min// kun nas nyon mongs de la rnam rtog cing //
197b2(mdo sde): rnam byang lha la byis pa gang chags pa// dmigs pa'i lha la rab gnas de la ni// byang chub med cing sangs rgyas chos kyang med// gang zhig sangs rgyas chos la 'dod skyed pa// de la sangs
197b3(mdo sde): rgyas byang chub ring ba ste// yod min chos la 'dod pa bskyed pa na// de ni sdug bsngal yongs su mod par 'gyur// gang dag 'dod chags zhe sdang mi rtog cing // gti mug chud pas byang chub rnam
197b4(mdo sde): lta ba// de la sangs rgyas byang chub ring ba min// bzod pa mchog kyang myur du des thob 'gyur// 'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas sus mthong ba// de ni 'khor ba'i chos las gzhar mi 'grol/
197b5(mdo sde): gang gis khams de mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa// de myur skyes bu sangs rgyas mchog tu 'gyur// gang gis sangs rgyas chos dang sangs rgyas dag/ thams cad kun tu nam yang ma mthong na//
197b6(mdo sde): chos rnams kun gyis gos pa med pa de// bdud bcom byang chub mngon par 'tshang yang rgya// su zhig sems can rnam par 'grel 'dod pa// des ni sems can khams su blta mi bya//
197b7(mdo sde): ma lus sems can mya ngan 'das dang 'dra// de ltar sus shes de na rang byung 'gyur// dgon pa'i chos la gang zhig mi snang zhing // grong du phyin na spyod lam 'chos byed pa// de ni 'jig rten lhar
198a1(mdo sde): bcas rkun po ste// de la byang chub sems rgyas chos rnams med// bdag ni sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes gang rlom pa// byis pa de ni gti mug dbang gis non// sangs
198a2(mdo sde): rgyas chos ni nam mkha' mtshungs pa ste// blang dang dor ba'i sgra ni de la med// rgyal bas nam yang byang chub sangs ma rgyas// des ni sems can nam yang bkrol ba med// med pa'i chos rnams
198a3(mdo sde): brtags shing byis pa'i rnams// sangs rgyas byang chub las ni ring ba yin// sems can 'di dag nyon mongs su mthong ba// de la nyon mongs mtha' yas 'byung bar 'gyur// sem can
198a4(mdo sde): de dag sems can med ces gsungs// sems can 'du shes gnas la byang chub med// gang gis sems can shin tu grol mthong zhing // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rtag med la//
198a5(mdo sde): sems can zhi zhing rab zhi rnam zhi bar// gang gis shes pa de ni mgon por 'gyuraro// gang gis sems can sems can med ma mthong // yang dag nyid du sangs rgyas chos la dmigs//
198a6(mdo sde): ji ltar sems can de bzhin sangs rgyas shes// de ltar sus shes de ni mgon por 'gyur// nyon mongs rtog na nyon mongs yod par 'gyur// tshul bzhin lam sems de bzhin nyon
198a7(mdo sde): mongs yod// nyon mongs lam du nam yang ma brtags na// de ni byang chub mi rtogs thob bo// stong pa'i chos kyis mi mkhas gang 'jigs pa// de dag sangs rgyas chos las ring ba yin/
198b1(mdo sde): stong nyid chos la the tsom su med pa// de dag sangs rgyas byang chub 'thob par 'gyur// byang chub mchog rdeb par ni su 'dod pa// de ni 'dod chags chos la rtag mi bya// 'dod chags chos kyi mtshan nyid
198b2(mdo sde): gang yin pa// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan bsam mi khyab// gang zhig sangs rgyas sa la mi 'jug cing // sems dang byang chub skye ba med pa dang // sems dang sangs rgyas byang chub gnyis med par//
198b3(mdo sde): shes par gyur na de ni mgon por 'gyur// sdig sems mu stegs can gyis gang brjod dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs gang bka' stsal pa// de dag tha dad tshul gyur med pa ste// de lta
198b4(mdo sde): shes na de ni mgon por 'gyur// gang gis byang chub mthong zhing smon byed pa// de dang byang chub ring ste byang chub med// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas min pa mi mnyam zhe 'am// sangs rgyas 'di zhes mi
198b5(mdo sde): rtog mgon por 'gyur// gang zhig bdag ni sems can 'brel pa zhes// rlom na sems can 'du shes chags rmongs pas// dmigs par lha la rab gnas de la ni// byang chub med cing sangs/
198b6(mdo sde): rgyas chos kyang med// 'dod chags nang dang phyi na mi gnas de// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams gang na'ang yod pa min// chos rnams yod min rnam par brtabs byas shing // byis pa 'dod chags
198b7(mdo sde): 'du shes de ltar rmongs// sgyu ma smig rgyu brag cha lta bu ste// mo gau sham bu dang rmi lam 'dra ba ni// nyon mongs 'di dag thams cad dmigs su med// byis pa de ltar mi shes rnam par rmongs//
199a1(mdo sde): 'dus byas chos dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos// de dag tha dad gnyis su nam yang med// gang la grangs dang bgrang du med pa dag/ de yi tshul gyis gnyis su med par 'jug/
199a2(mdo sde): byis pa gang zhig byang chub sems rlom zhing // sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes rlom sems byed gyur na// chos kyi dngos nyid phyag rgya 'di bor bas// de la sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub med// smra la gang
199a3(mdo sde): dgra' yong su rtog yul can// smra ba'i don la rnam par mi sems shing // ming dang legs la de bzhin chags gyur pa// de dag byang chub 'gyur bar the tsom yod// lta ba'i rnam pa byang chub
199a4(mdo sde): gnyis med gsungs// ming dang yi ge'i grangs dang skad 'jug pas// mi mkhas gang gis chos 'di ma rtogs pa// de dag sangs rgyas byang chub ring bar gnas// ming la chags shing sgrib/
199a5(mdo sde): dga' ba dang // bdag tu lha la gang zhig gnas gyur cing // 'dod pa rlung dang chog shes rnam brtags pas// dad pa'i dbang gis da dung de 'dug go/ 'dod chags chos las shed skyes gang
199a6(mdo sde): 'bros pa// de ni 'dod chags chos las gzhar mi 'grol// gang gis yang dag 'dod chags chos shes na// 'dod chags bral ba'i 'dod chag chos shes 'gyur// yun ring dus su tshul
199a7(mdo sde): khrims bsrungs byas shing // bskal pa bye bar bsam gtan bskyed byas kyang // yang dag nyid mtha' 'di ni ma rtogs na// bstan pa 'di la de dag blo yod min// ci yang ma yin chos 'di
199b1(mdo sde): sus shes pa// nam yang de ni chos kun chags mi 'gyur// tshul khrims 'chal dang tshul khrim rnam brtags pas// byis pa dmigs pa'i spyod yul thar mi 'gyur// tshul khrims tshul//
199b2(mdo sde): khrims med par sus shes shing // tshul khrims 'chal dang tshul khrims tshul gcig ces// tshul khrims ngang tshul de ltar sus shes pa// tshul khrims 'tshal dang de la nam yang meng
199b3(mdo sde): chos rgyal chos la rtogs pa ma gyur na// thabs kyi sa la sems can rnams 'dul zhing // byang chub zad med zhig pa 'di la yang // tshul gcig chos kyis sems can 'dzud pa yin/
199b4(mdo sde): chos rgyal dam pa'i chos 'di mi g.yo zhing // dngos med mtshan nyid med la tshul gcig par// ngo bo nyid kyis stong chos ma thos pas// g.yang sa chen por byis pa de dag lhung // chos 'di//
199b5(mdo sde): thos shing mi dngang gang gyur pa// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga chags khyim pa'ang sla'i// bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung gyur cing // dmigs lha sbyangs pa'i yon tan rlom pa min// phyogs bcu kun
199b6(mdo sde): na sangs rgyas rang byung ba// 'jig rten don mdzad gang dag bzhugs pa rnams// de dag kun gyis nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i chos// g.yo ba med shes byang chub 'gyur zhes gsungs// mi
199b7(mdo sde): mkhas gang rnams mi sdug bsgom sems shing // chos rab 'di thos 'jigs par gyur pa dag/ rtag par sdug bsngal tshe dang ldan gyur cing // bskal pa bye ba mang por sdug bsngal 'gyur//
200a1(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'dri bshad pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// dge slong stong phrag brgyad cu nye bar len pa medapa/
200a2(mdo sde): zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i blo gros kyang 'chi ba'i dus bgyis nas/ dog sA'i sgra phye ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung ngo // de sug
200a3(mdo sde): las kyi sgrib pa des bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu sdug bsngal tsha zhing rtsub la yid du 'ong ba'i tshor ba mi bzad pa myong bar gyur to// tshe rabs brgya
200a4(mdo sde): stong phrag bdun cu rtsa bzhir mi snyan pa brjod pa thob par gyur to// bskal pa brgya stong mang por de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan tsam yang ma thos par gyur to// de de nas slad kyis de bzhin gsheg pa/
200a5(mdo sde): gzhan dang / gzhan dag dang mjal te/ de dag gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ mngon par mos par ma gyur te/ tshe rabs stong phrag bdun cu rtsa drug rab tu byung ba las slar babs par gyur to//
200a6(mdo sde): sug las kyi sgrib pa de nyid kyi lhag mas tshe rabs brgya stong phrag meng por dbang po rtul bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dge slong chos smra ba rab tu dga' bo'i dbang
200a7(mdo sde): po zhes bgyi ba byung ba de ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes chos kyang ston to// shar phyogs kyi
200b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen sna tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/
200b2(mdo sde): gzi brjid sdug cing dri ma med la/ nyi zla zil gyis gnon pa bzhugs shing 'tsho ga zhes chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bgyi bar gang gyur pa de ni kha dag/
200b3(mdo sde): nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bgyi bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de'i tshe tshul 'di ma 'tshal bas/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das
200b4(mdo sde): bdag ni de 'dra ba'i gnas su gyur te/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma mchis pa'i sdug bsngal yongs su brtags pa'i sdug bsngal phyin ci log gi sdug bsngal rnam pa de lta bu myong bar gyur to// bcom
200b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das de lta lags pas byang chub sems dpo'i theg pa la zhugs pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhugs pa gang yang rung ste/ de lta bu'i sug las kyi sgrib pa mi 'tshal zhing / de lta ba'i
200b6(mdo sde): sdul bsngal mi 'tshal na/ ngos dam pa'i chos spang bar mi bgyi'o// dam pa'i chos la dpya bar mi bgyi'o// chos gang la yang khong khro bar mi bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan
200b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal tshigs su bcad pa de thos pas khyod la khyad par ci zhig tu gyur/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
201a1(mdo sde): 'das tshigs su bcad pa de thos pas/ sug las kyi sgrib pa de las langs nas/ gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de dag kun tu yang zab mo'i bzod pa can/ nges pa'i
201a2(mdo sde): bzod pa can du gyur te/ chos zab mo ston pa la mkhas par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal su'i mthus khyod kyis de ltar yun ring po na mngon par 'du byas/
201a3(mdo sde): pa'i las kyi sgrib pa rjes su dran/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ ci sems kyi rjes su ci dran yang / de dag thams cad de bzhin ga shig/
201a4(mdo sde): pa'i mthu ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa las byung ba ni chos thams cad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs
201a5(mdo sde): pas stobs bcu thob pa dang / 'di thos pa 'di ni mtshungs so// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang / 'di thos pa de ni mtshungs so// 'jam dpal gyis gsol da / bdag gis bcom
201a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ chos kyi
201a7(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di thos pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// 'on kyang sbyor ba med pa la de thos nas mos par mi 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa lung mi ston to//
201b1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la ba 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus/
201b2(mdo sde): lnga brgya tha ma la ci nas kyang // chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par 'gyur zhing / skye bo mang po'i sug par 'gyur ba dang / de la bdud ngam bdud kyi ris kyi lha grang gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur
201b3(mdo sde): ba de ltar byir gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ g.yas g.yon su gzigs so// bcom ldan 'das
201b4(mdo sde): kyis de ltar gzigs pa thag tu de'i tshe phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur/ rab tu g.yos par gyur/ kun tu g.yos par gyur to// de'i
201b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag nas/
201b6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin byis brlabs so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ phyogs bcu na gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed yod pa de bas kyang shin tu mang ba'i sems can rnams kyis mi
201b7(mdo sde): skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/ gang dag nyan thos nyid la gnas par gyur pa dang / slob pa'i sa 'am/ mi slob pa'i sa la gnas par gyur pa dag ni smos kyang mi smos so//
202a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ ji ltar gzung bar
202a2(mdo sde): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
202a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / lha'i bu pad+mo rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub
202a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' tshogs chen po de dang / dge slong lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das
202a5(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par dgra' 'o// 'phags pa chos thams cad 'byung ba med par bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// /
202a6(mdo sde): tsa ba ban+d+he rin chen 'tshos bsgyur cing zhus/ glegs bam du ma la gtugs te ci nus kyis zhus dag bgyis// // rgya gar skad du
202a7(mdo sde): Ar+ya s+t+rI bi ba ra ta byA ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bude med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po
202b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga stong /
202b2(mdo sde): gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' brgyang stong mngon par grags pa/ mngon par shes pa thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ mi 'jigs pa thob pa/ mi skye
202b3(mdo sde): ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ theg pa chen po'i rjes su song ba sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
202b4(mdo sde): dpa' chen po mu khyud 'dzin dang / sa 'dzin dang / bar rim 'dzin dang / mchod sbyin rus 'dzin dang / snang ba'i blo gros dang / rnam par dag pa'i blo gros dang / sbyangs pa'i blo gas
202b5(mdo sde): dang khyad par blo gros dang / mtha' yas blo gros dang / 'phel ba'i blo gros dang / mthong dga' dang / lcags mthong dang / cher snang dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don
202b6(mdo sde): kun mthong la sogs pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus
202b7(mdo sde): bar gyur te 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na rten cing bzhugs te/ rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i bu rnams dang / tshong dpon rnamang
203a1(mdo sde): khyim bdag rnams dang / blon po rnams dang / 'khor rnams dang / grong rdul ba dang / yul gyi mi rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas ka ri mo byas
203a2(mdo sde): mchod pa byas so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ smad g.yogs dang / chos gos bgros/ lhung bzang thogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la
203a3(mdo sde): ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la kra tshe dang ldan pa
203a4(mdo sde): rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mdang sum bdag gi rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa zhig mthong ste/ des phyag g.ya/
203a5(mdo sde): papa gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas bdag gi spyi bor bzhag ste/ rab 'byor sang khyod kyis sngon ma thos pa'i chos bstan pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes/ de skad ces bka' stsal na
203a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de gang gi snga lta sA lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo chos 'dod pa rnams kyi sngon ma thos pa'i
203a7(mdo sde): chos thos par 'gyur ba'i snga lhas yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
203b1(mdo sde): chen por bsod snyoms la mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de'i dus la dbab par shes na song zhig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis/
203b2(mdo sde): gnang nus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la zhugs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyal po'i
203b3(mdo sde): khab kyi grong khyer chen por mtha' chags su bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing song ba las/ khyim bdag gcig gis gnas ga ba la der song ste phyin nas sgo khang gi nang logs su cang mi smra
203b4(mdo sde): bar sdod do// de nas khyim de'i nang nas bud med mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ blta na sdug pa/ rgyan gyis legs par klubs te/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / byu ru dang / gser
203b5(mdo sde): gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ dpal shin tu 'bar ba/ kha dog rgyas shing mdzes pa dang ldan pa zhig byeng ngo // de nas bud med des tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/
203b6(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor khyod ci zhig bzhed pa'i slad du sgo khang 'di na gzhes/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ che zhe bdag ni bsod snyoms 'dod
203b7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/ sgo khang 'di na sdod do// bud med des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor khyod la da rung yang bsod snyoms kyi 'du shes 'byung lags sam/ btsun pa rab 'byor da rung yang bsod
204a1(mdo sde): snyoms kyi 'du shes thugs su ma chud dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ che zhe bdag gis bsod snyoms kyi 'du shes ni khong du chud mod kyi/ 'on kyang pha ma las
204a2(mdo sde): skyes pa'i 'bras chan dang / zan dron gyis bskyed pa 'di zas med kyi bar du 'tsho bar mi nus so// bud med des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gyis ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed
204a3(mdo sde): 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/
204a4(mdo sde): skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor 'gag/ tshor ba 'gugs pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa
204a5(mdo sde): 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa 'gag pa mngon
204a6(mdo sde): sum du ma mdzad dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ che zhe bdag gis 'gog pa mngon sum du byas so// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ci zhig ni 'gog par 'gyur/ chos gang ni rab tu bsgom
204a7(mdo sde): par bgyi/ smras pa/ che zhe 'gog pa ni/ chos gang gi rab tu bsgom par bya ba yang ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gal te 'gog pa chos gang gi rab tu bsgom pa yang ma
204b1(mdo sde): lags nA/ btsun pa rab 'byor gyis lus bsod snyoms kyis ji ltar 'tsho bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ che zhe 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs te/ tshor ba thams cad bkag pa las langs pa'i/
204b2(mdo sde): lus 'tsho bar byeng byed do// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gal te gtan du mya ngan las 'das na khyod kyi lus ji ltar 'tsho ba la 'jug par 'gyur/ smras pa/ che zhe bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan
204b3(mdo sde): thos rnams ni lus 'tsho bar bya ba'i phyir bsod snyoms la rgyu'o// smras pa/ des na bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun pa rab 'byor nyin mongs po med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu ma bstan
204b4(mdo sde): tama?/ smras pa/ che zhe de yin no// smras pa/ ci nyon mongs pa med pa de rgyu ba 'am/ rab tu rgyu ba lags snyam/ smras pa/ che zhe ma yin no// smras pa/ 'o na ci'i slad du/ btsun pa
204b5(mdo sde): 'byor bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad/ smras pa/ che zhe bdag ni lus che ba'i phyir/ bsod snyoms la rgyu ba ma yin gyi/ srog gi phyir tshor ba 'gag pa'i don du bsod snyoms la rgyu'o// smras
204b6(mdo sde): pa btsun pa rab 'byor da dung yang tshor bar 'phrogs sam/ smras pa/ che zhi bdag ni tshor bar mi 'phrogs mod kyi/ tshor ba 'gag pa'i phyir bsod snyoms la rgyu'o// smras pa/ btsun pa rab
204b7(mdo sde): 'byor nyon mongs pa med pa ni mtshungs pa med pa ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa ni lus dang sems kyis tshor rab myong ba ma mchis so// nyon mongs pa med pa'i lus
205a1(mdo sde): sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma lags so// nyon mongs pa med pa ni dga' ba 'am/ mi dga' ba skyed par mi bgyid do// nyon mongs pa med par ni su la yang nyon mong/
205a2(mdo sde): pas nye bar gnas pa ma mchis so// gzhan yang gang gi slad du ka bcom ldan 'das kyis/ btsun pa rab 'byor nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan nA/ ci'i slad
205a3(mdo sde): du ni/ nyon mongs pa med pa nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bgyi/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ che zhe dmigs pa med pa'i nyon mongs pa med pa ni/ 'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral ba yin no// smras
205a4(mdo sde): pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ci nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir/ 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ che zhes yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor 'o ni nyon mongs pa med pa de ji ltar/
205a5(mdo sde): 'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ che zhe nyon mongs pa med par bstan pa 'di ni bshad pa tsam du zad do// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ci nyon mongs pa med pa la bshad
205a6(mdo sde): pa mchis sam/ smras pa che zhe med do// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gal te nyon mongs pa med pa la bshad pa ma mchis na/ ci zhig 'chad cing bzhugs/ smras pa/ che zhe bcom
205a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni tha snyad tsam gyis tha snyad du 'dogs par zad do// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ji tsam du brjod pa mchis pa de tsam du tha snyad 'dogs so// ji tsam
205b1(mdo sde): dudz+ra skad 'dogs pa de tsam du phyin ci log go/ ji tsam du phyin ci log pa de tsam du rtsod par 'gyur ro// ji tsam du rtsod pa de tsam du dge sbyong gi chos ma lags so// smras pa/ chen /
205b2(mdo sde): ni dge sbyong gi chos gang yin// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong gi chos ni tha snyad ma mchis bya/ phyin ci ma log pa// rtsod pa ma mchis pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni chos dang /
205b3(mdo sde): chos mo lags pa dang bral ba'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni chags pa dang / ma chags pa dang bral ba'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni yul ma mchis pa dang / yul mi lags pa'o// dag
205b4(mdo sde): sbyong gi chos ni chags pa ma mchis pa dang / mu bcings ma grol ba'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni sems ma mchis pa ste/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'o//
205b5(mdo sde): dge sbyong gi chos ni chog shes pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni phrag dog dang chags pa spongs pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni 'dod pa thams
205b6(mdo sde): cad dong bral ba'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / zhen pa ma mchis pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni phung po'i bdud las nges par grol ba'o// dge sbyon
205b7(mdo sde): gi chos ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa ste/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud las yang dag par 'das pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni ma skyes pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni 'chi bdag gi bdud dang bral
206a1(mdo sde): pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni g.yo ba ma mchis padud / rlom sems ma mchis pa dang / rtog pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par mya bstizla pa dang / sbyar ba ma lag pa'o//
206a2(mdo sde): dge sbyong gi chos ni bdud kyi yul los yang dag par 'das pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni blang ba ma mchis pa dang / dor ba ma mchis pa'o// dge sbyong ga chos ni skye ba dang / 'jig par
206a3(mdo sde): thazal po'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni lha'i bu'i bdud dang ma 'bag pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni yid la byed pa ma mchis pa dang / thams cad du gos pa ma mchis pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni mngon
206a4(mdo sde): par zhen pa ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'o// dge sbyong gi chos ni khams dang khams ma lags pa'i tshul thams cad kyis bcos pa ma la
206a5(mdo sde): pa dang / bgrang ba dang bral ba dang / gnas ma mchis pa dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o// dge sbyong gi chos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ sgo khang der lha'i bu gang dag chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dus
206a6(mdo sde): pabade dag las/ lha'i bu bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// rgya chen po la mos pa'i lha'i bu lnga brgya ni bud med de'i spobs pa thos nas/
206a7(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/ cha zhe 'di ltar spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa de ning
206b1(mdo sde): mtshar te/ che zhe 'di'i spobs pa 'di 'dra ba lags na/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa yin par the tsom medo snyam mo// de nas bud med de'i sems kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/
206b2(mdo sde): gyi sems shes nas/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ltar 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa yin par the tsom med do snyam du dgongs
206b3(mdo sde): pa de ni/ ji ltar dgongs pa de bzhin te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin nyid du thugs su chud pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang de bzhin nyid khong du chud do// /
206b4(mdo sde): des na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
206b5(mdo sde): pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyang de bzhin nyid do// des na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lag pa
206b6(mdo sde): de ni/ rnams kyang de bzhin nyid ma lags par mi 'gyur ro// bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de ni nams kyang
206b7(mdo sde): bzhin nyid ma lags par mi 'gyur te/ des na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de ni res 'ga' de bzhin nyid du 'gyur
207a1(mdo sde): ba ma lags la/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de yang res 'ga' de bzhin nyid du 'gyur ba ma lags kyi/ rtag tu de bzhin nyid de kho na lags so//
207a2(mdo sde): des na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o// bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang / chos thams cad kyi
207a3(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid gang lagasu pad+ma ni/ yang dag pa ji lta ba dang / gzhan ma yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid de/ des na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
207a4(mdo sde): 'byor gyis/ bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhe ci khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag gi sems shes sam/ 'on te rang gi shes pas shes/ smras pa/
207a5(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor nyan thos rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sam/ drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa gang yang rung ste/ sems
207a6(mdo sde): can gzhan gyi sems shes pa de dag thams cad ni/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus gzhan gyi sems shes pa lags so// da ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor gzhan gyi sems mkhyen pa
207a7(mdo sde): gang lags pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus mkhyen pa lags so// btsun pa rab 'byor dper na zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / me dang / nor bu dang / mar me dang / skar ma la brten nas/
207b1(mdo sde): skyes bu mig dang ldan pa rnams kyis gzugs rnams mthong ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor ma rig pa'i mun pa na 'jig rten gnas pa las/ gang su dag pha rol gyi sems/
207b2(mdo sde): shes pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa la brten nus shes pa lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhe khyod
207b3(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i spobs pa dang ldan pa khyod su yin pa dang / ga las 'ongs pa bdag la ston cig/ bud med des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul
207b4(mdo sde): pa la 'dra ste/ rigs kyi bu khyod su yin pa dang / galas 'ongs pa bdag la ston cig ces de skad smras na/ ji skad du lan 'debs par 'gyur/ smras pa/ che zhe cung zad kyang lan
207b5(mdo sde): gdab tu med do// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes na/ bdag gis ci zhig shes su mchis/ gzhan yang gang zhig btsun
207b6(mdo sde): ba rab 'byor la 'dri ste/ ci khyed so so'i skye bo yin nam/ 'on te slob pa 'am/ dgra bcom pa yin zhes de skad smras na lan ji skad gdab/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems pa la zhug
207b7(mdo sde): te/ che zhi 'di'i lan ji ltar gdab par bya snyam mo// de nas bar snang las btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyis cung zad ci thob pa'am/ rtogs pa 'am/ mngon sum du byas pa 'am/ mngon pa
208a1(mdo sde): rtogs pa gang gis dgra bcom pa yin par shes pa de/ che zhe 'di la lhan cig ces sgra byung ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bar snang de las sgra byung ba de thos
208a2(mdo sde): nas bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhe bdag ni so so'i skye bo yang ma yin/ slob pa yang ma yin/ dgra bcom pa yang ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de bdag gis/
208a3(mdo sde): ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ smras pa/ che zhe de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i bdags pa ji lta ba de bzhin du bdag la zung zhig/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ni dgra bcom pa/ zag pa
208a4(mdo sde): zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog dang / yon gnas zhes bgyi ba lags so// smras pa/ che zhe bdag ni dgra bcom pa zag pa zad panyon mongs pa med/
208a5(mdo sde): bapar gnas pa rnams kyi mchog dang yon gnas ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ltar na shes bzhin gyi brdzun gsung bar mi 'gyur ramasmras pa/ che zhe gal te bdag zag
208a6(mdo sde): pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog dang yon gnas yin par 'dzin par gyur na ni/ de ltar bdag brdzun du smra bar 'gyur na/ gang gi phyir bdag de ltar mi 'dzin pa
208a7(mdo sde): de'i phyir/ bdag ni yang dag par smra ba yin gyi/ brdzun du smra ba zhes mi bya'o// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor sgo khang 'dir lha bden pa mthong ba chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ 'dus pa rnams la
208b1(mdo sde): slu bar mi 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ che zhe bden pa mthong ba de dag ni bslu bar mi nus so// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gyis bden pa rnams gzigs sum/ smras pa/ mthong ngo //
208b2(mdo sde): smras pa/ gal te bden pa rnams mthong du rung na ni/ de dag bden pa me lags par 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bden pa rnams ni sus kyang mthong bar mi nus pa'i slad du'o// rab 'byor
208b3(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ che zhe bden pa mthong ba zhes bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dwags yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor bden pa mthong ba zhes bgyi ba de ni/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par
208b4(mdo sde): mthong ba'i tshig bla dgas so// bden pa mthong ba zhes bgyi ba de ni/ phyin ci log yang dag par mthong ba'i tshig bla dgas so// smras pa/ che zhe khyod kyis gang las bsams te de skad smras//
208b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor phyin ci log las nyon mongs pa kun nas bslang ba gang lags pa de ni bden pa mthong bas skye bar 'gyur te/ des na phyin ci log yang dag par mthong bas bden
208b6(mdo sde): pa mthong zhes bgyi'o// de nus sgo khang der chos mnyan pa'i phyir lha 'dus pa de dag gis/ gnas brtan rab 'byor la rags pa'i lus bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab
208b7(mdo sde): 'byor khyed kyis che zhe 'di'i spobs pa thos pa de ni/ khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// sems can gang dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas mos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin
209a1(mdo sde): no// gang dag mos pa de dag ni gang las kyang rnam par grol ba med do// de ci'i phyi madren/ mos pa mang bya rnams ni gang nas kyang rnam par grol ba med do/ ma/
209a2(mdo sde): pa mang ba la ni 'ching ba med pas na/ de ni gang lus kyang rnam par grol ba med do// de nas bud med des yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun rab 'byor bso/
209a3(mdo sde): snyoms la rgyur mi bzhud dam/ ba shos bcad de ci bgyi/ smras pa/ che zhe bdag gi zas ni 'di nyid yin te/ chos mnyan pa 'di lta bus chog go che zhwa gang gi chos gos dang / bsod
209a4(mdo sde): snyoms kyi phyir yid mi bde ba skye ba de ni chos 'dod pa ma yin no// gang rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa ma yin no// gang lus dang / srog/
209a5(mdo sde): dang / bsod snyoms 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa ma yin no// gang tha na legs so zhes bya ba 'dod pa de yang chos 'dod pa ma yin no// smras pa/ che zhe rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
209a6(mdo sde): bu mo dag chos 'dod pa ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang 'dod pa la mi srid ba de ni chos 'dod pa'o// gang mig dang / gzugs mi 'dod pa dang / rna ba dang / sgra dang /
209a7(mdo sde): sna dang / dri dang / lce dang / ro dang / lus dang / reg bya dang / yod dang / chos mi 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa'o// gang chos ci la yang mi rten pa de ni chos 'dod pa'o// btsun pa rab 'byor
209b1(mdo sde): gzham yang gang phung po dang / khams dang / lcem med mi 'dod pa don chos 'dod pa'o// gang 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa myi 'dod pa de ni rgyas 'du 'o zhug
209b2(mdo sde): ba'i mtshan ma la dmigs pa mi 'dod pa don// chos 'dod pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhe bzod par gyis shig/ ba sa
209b3(mdo sde): spro yang 'di nas 'gro'o// bud med des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor dper na/ sa'i khams la bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi sems sa dpa
209b4(mdo sde): bde la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal lo// btsun pa rab 'byor chu la bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du/ gang gi sems chu dang 'dra ba de la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal lo// mang
209b5(mdo sde): rlung dang / nam mkha' la bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du/ gang gi sems me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang 'dra ba de la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal lo// btsun pa rab 'byor/
209b6(mdo sde): gru dang / stegs dang / zam pa dang / lam po che la bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi sems gru dang / stegs dang / zam pa dang / lam po che dang 'dra ba de//
209b7(mdo sde): la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal lo// btsun pa rab 'byor byis pa rnam la ni bzod pa gsol 'tshal gyi/ 'phags pa rnams la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal lo// btsun pa rab 'byor gang
210a1(mdo sde): dag la gnod sems dang / khro ba dang / bgra la nyal skye ba de la ni bzod pa gsol 'tshal gyi/ gang dag mi skye ba de dag la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal lo// btsun pa rab 'byo/
210a2(mdo sde): dper na/ me 'bar ba ni zhi bar bgyi 'tshal gyi/ mi 'bar ba ni zhi bar bgyi mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang dag gi nyon mongs pa 'bar ba de dag la ni bzod pa gsol 'tshal gyi//
210a3(mdo sde): gang dag nyon mongs pa med pa de dag la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal lo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhe khyod ci zhig 'dod na 'di ltar seng
210a4(mdo sde): ge'i sgra sgrogs/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang 'dod pa mchis pa des ni seng ge'i sgra sgrogs mi nus so// gang dag ci yang mi 'dod pa de dag ni seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par bgyid do// de
210a5(mdo sde): ci'i slad du zhe na/ dmigs pa mchis pa la ni 'dod pa mchis la/ gang la dmigs pa mchis pa de la ni seng ge'i sgra ci yang ma mchis so// 'jig tshogs pa lta ba mchis pa la ni 'dod pa
210a6(mdo sde): mchis la/ gang la lta ba'i rnam pa mchis pa de la ni seng ge'i sgra ci yang ma mchis so// btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang ci zhig bzhed pas len pa med par zag pa rnams las sem rnam par
210a7(mdo sde): grol bar gyur/ smras pa/ tsha zhe 'dod pa yod pa la ni rnam par grol ba ci yang med do// smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor gang bzhed pa len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par
210b1(mdo sde): grol ba de bzhin du bdag kyang de lta bu'i 'jug pas zhugs so// bdag kyang de lta bu'i rnam par grol ba'i 'jug pas zhugs so// bdag kyang de lta bu'i chos kyi dbyings kyi 'jug pas zhugasaso//
210b2(mdo sde): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhe theg pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa rnams dang / rtags gang yin pa rnams dang / mtshan ma gang dag yin pa
210b3(mdo sde): 'di lta bu dag bdag la ston pa las na/ khyod ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin par the tsom med do// bud med des smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po'i rnam pa
210b4(mdo sde): rnams dang / rtags rnams dang / mtshan ma rnams mkhyen tam/ smras pa/ che zhe nyan thos kyis ni ma thos par theg pa chen po'i rnam pa rnams dang / rtags rnams dang / mtshan ma
210b5(mdo sde): rnams shes par mi nus kyis/ che zhe theg pa chen po'i rnam pa rnams dang / rtags rnams dang / mtshan ma rnams shod cig/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor thug pa chen po zhes bgyi
210b6(mdo sde): ba de ni chags pa ma mchis pa'i theg pa dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes dang / tha dad pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so// btsun pa rab 'byor dper na las su
210b7(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i lha'i bu rnams dang / zla ba dang nyi ma'i gzhal med khang rnams ni sems can rnams la snang bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ chags pa ma mchis pa dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa dang //
211a1(mdo sde): rgyun mi 'chad par nam mkha' la shugs kyis mchi ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams ni sems
211a2(mdo sde): can thams cad la chos kyi snang ba bgyi ba'i slad du/ chags pa ma mchis pa dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa dang / rgyun mi 'chad par pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi shugs kyis mchi'o//
211a3(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor dper na gling bzhi ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i lags te/ de dag gang dang gang du mchi ba de dang der gling bzhi pa'i mi rnams kyis bsten pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba lags la
211a4(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang sems can de dag la bsam pa mi mnyam pa'i rnam pa ma mchis te/ byams par bgyid pa de bzhin de/ btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po la yang
211a5(mdo sde): dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad du gang dang gang du mchis pa/
211a6(mdo sde): de dang der sems can thams cad kyis bsten pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba legs la/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms shing / tha dad du spyod pa ma mchis so// byang chub sems
211a7(mdo sde): dpa' rnams ni bsdu ba rnam pa bzhis sdud pa na sems la byams pa tha dad pa ma mchis te/ des na theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/
211b1(mdo sde): theg pa de che ba lags la/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang ga mi dang / mi ma/
211b2(mdo sde): yin pa rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshongs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang / mkhas pa rnams dang / skyes bu dam pa rnams dang / shes pa rnams dang / yang dag par
211b3(mdo sde): song ba rnams dang / yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis mchod pa logs te/ des na theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// theg pa de ni ma skyes pa'i phyir mi zad pa'o// theg pa de ni
211b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad pa'o// theg pa de ni chos kyi rigs sdud pa'o// theg pa de ni dge 'dun gyi rigs yongs su 'dzin pa'o// theg pa de ni sems can thams cad lag/
